description: NI Rail is the offline train timetable app for Northern Ireland Railways Translink users. We hope this app will help commuters get around Belfast and Northern Ireland with less fuss and hassle. No longer do you need to carry the paper timetable nor constantly look up times online! ********************************* Now supports Multijourney routes! ********************************* This is not an official Translink application, we are in no way affiliated. * Supports multiple trains in a single journey! * Favourite stations and routes on the dashboard! * Delay notifications in app, from Translink's Twitter page * Station page containing all arrivals, links to maps and directions. * Alarm for your train * See were your train should be on the map! (Timetables aren't accurate on special holidays such as Christmas Day, Boxing Day, New Year's Day, St Patrick's Day, Easter weekend, May Day, July Holidays and other public holidays) NI Railways, Northern Ireland Railways, Translink Timetable App, timetables, train times, NIR
release_text: Updated to include the new April timetables and fix a few bugs that have cropped up.

Now with a new Android themed interface! Unlike many Bible trivia apps all of our ads are are filtered and should not have any inappropriate material whatsoever. Addicted - ★★★★★ (by Giocare) "Love the simple premise, but how challenging it is to complete a puzzle. Good interface. Many hours of fun await. It's like a crossword without the words." Addictive - ★★★★★ (by Jigarama) "This is a great version of nonograms. I have done most of the games like these and this is one of the best controls." Nonograms is based on the addictive Japanese puzzle game. Much like Sudoku and other such puzzles, the goal in Nonograms is to fill cells in a grid according to the provided hints. Nonograms includes over 10,000 unique, challenging puzzles developed by Atanas Georgiev, founder of puzzle-nonograms.com. These puzzles are what makes this app so great. Unlike other puzzles that are generated randomly, these puzzles use sophisticated algorithm to test for maximum enjoyability. The puzzles included range in size from the simple 5x5 to the challenging 20x20 (Some resolution devices are limited to 5x5 - 15x15. The controls have been designed specifically for Android and are effortless to play. Features: • 10,000 different puzzles designed by the awesome Atanas Georgiev, operator of puzzle-loop.com, ensure that you will never run out of fresh puzzles • Currently played puzzle is always saved so you can resume it at a later time • Beautiful graphics let you play in peace • Turn sounds on and off • Game timer keeps you engaged • Auto-fill feature fills a complete row or column with 'x'. Very useful for larger puzzles. How to play: Nonograms board is a square grid. Each cell on the grid can be either on or off. The top and left edges of the grid contain hint numbers. The hints describe the chain of connected marked cells that appear in the row or column. For example, if the hints for a row is 3 2, it means that the row has three consecutive cells marked, followed by at least on non-marked cell, and the two consecutive marked cells. The puzzle is solved when all the cells are filled-in correctly. Use the 'X' to specify that a particular cell cannot be marked.

Now you and your friends can see who is the quickest with I Buzzed First! Have you ever wanted to host your own quiz, but needed an easy way to know who is the first to answer? I Buzzed First! is the app you need. One phone acts as the 'Quiz Master', and any number of Contestants (on separate phones) connect to the quiz. When you're ready to start, the Quiz Master starts the first round, and the buzzer buttons on all the Contenstant's phones light up. The first Contestant to press their buzzer is rewarded with a satisfying sound, and locks all the other Contestants out. Then the Quiz Master starts the next round, and off you go again! Great for setting up quiz bowl / game show buzzer / trivia party / Jeopardy gameshow type events when you need to buzz in. I Buzzed First! even tells everyone in the quiz the name of the person who buzzed first. Any number of Contestants can connect to the same quiz. NOTE: The app will need to be installed on at least THREE phones to be useful. One phone acts as the 'Quiz Master', and two (or many more) other phones join the quiz to see who buzzes first. All the phones MUST be connected to the same WiFi network. (Will not work on 2/3G only) * Fully Compatible with the iPhone version of I Buzzed First! * You can form a quiz with any combination of Android Phones and iPhones running I Buzzed First! Please send any support questions to support@ibuzzedfirst.com for a speedy response

description: Quizomania is a ultimate knowledge challenge. This quiz game contains many game modes that will satisfy almost every quiz lover. It has been spiced up with smooth animations and impressive graphics that will surely impress you. Also this game doesn't require a internet connection, so you can enjoy it anywhere completely free! FEATURES ----------------- - 3 types of game modes (normal quiz, stages mode, survival mode) - 8 innovative jokers (Immunity, Skipper, 50:50, Buy time, Pause time, Eliminate one or two wrong answers. Change question) - More then 3 thousands of questions - 11 categories (Science, History, Biology, General knowledge, Culture, Geography, Literature, Movies, Music, Sport) - 13 achievements (bronze, silver and gold medals) - Highscore list for normal quiz and survival game mode - Questions are divided into 3 difficulties - Beautiful High definition graphic Normal quiz Goal is to answer 18 questions before time runs out. Questions are divided in three difficulties. If you need help you can buy jokers with score points and try to finish the game and get a bonus for your highscore. Stages mode Play in 8 different categories and combine score to unlock new more challenging levels. You are allowed to use help of jokers, but use it carefully because every point counts. Survival mode Try to stay in the game as long as you can without help. Wrong answer won't end the game, but will reduce play time. Every correct answer will increase play time, so choose your answers carefully. Jockers explanation: - Immunity Immunity jocker is jocker that will save you from giving a wrong answer. Immunity is an ultimate saver! - Skipper This jocker will allow you to skip given question. Really useful when playing normal quiz mode. - 50:50 This one is a well know but jet really desirable help. It will eliminate 2 wrong answers so you will have at least 50% chance to answer correctly - Buy time A must if you are short on game time, or you wish to think a bit longer! - Pause time Or we call it a freezer. Jocker that will allow you to freeze time on current question and think without stress or find an answer on internet :) - Change question This one will change your current question with another one of the same difficulties. Could be a great help if you feel lucky. Please be careful when buying jockers because you are buying them with the points you earned with correct answers. Also don't forget to try Immunity and Skipper. They are ultimate tool to help you! ----------- If you will have any problems with the game feel free to contact us via our contact form http://lightningstudio.net/index.php/contact and we will gladly help you.

description: Play this fairytale game featuring Sleeping Beauty. A king and a queen become the proud parents of a beautiful baby daughter, and they organize a huge feast for all their family members and friends and also for the fairies in the country. There are thirteen fairies, but there are only 12 golden plates, that's why the king doesn't invite one of the fairies. This fairy gets very upset. After the feast all the fairies wish the little baby all the best, but after the eleventh fairy the angry, uninvited fairy comes storming into the castle. She predicts that the child will prick herself on the needle of a spinning wheel when she'll be fifteen years old, and that she'll sleep for a hundred years! The king summons to destroy all the spinning wheels in the country, but one's accidentally left in the castle tower. On her fifteenth birthday the princess is wandering through the castle, and she enters into the tower where nobody has been for years anymore. She sees the spinning wheel and wants to touch it, but then she pricks herself! The girl falls on the bed behind her, into a deep, deep sleep. The whole castle falls asleep, too; even the flies on the wall don't manage to stay awake. A thick thorn-hedge grows around the whole castle and nobody remembers anymore that once, there was a castle. One day, a prince passes by the thorn-edge and he hacks his way through it. There, inside the thorn-hedge, he finds the castle, full of sleeping people. He starts walking through the castle, higher and higher, until he reaches the tower and sees the princess asleep. He falls in love with her on the spot and kisses her, which awakes her all of a sudden! The whole castle wakes up and a wedding's organized for the prince and the princess. They lived happily ever after... In this game you can read the entire story. Spot the differences and go for the highest score. To play on your pc or laptop go to: http://www.mary.com/sleeping-beauty-find-the-differences.html

description: O Manual de Medicamentos habitualmente utilizados em Pediatria da Nutrição Infantil da Nestlé é um aplicativo útil para o dia a dia dos profissionais de saúde, porque torna mais rápida e prática a busca por informações. É possível encontrar diversos medicamentos, organizados por categorias, princípios ativos, genéricos e originais. Além disso é possível realizar uma busca por termos específicos e adicionar aqueles mais consultados em sua área de Favoritos. Baixe já o aplicativo, disponível para celulares com Android, e tenha ao seu alcance todas as informações necessárias referente aos medicamentos mais usados na pediatria. O conteúdo deste aplicativo é restrito aos profissionais de saúde cadastrados no site www.nestlenutrition.com.br. Veja abaixo o que é preciso fazer para se cadastrar e acessar o aplicativo. Sobre o seu acesso 1. O conteúdo do aplicativo é exclusivo para profissionais da área da saúde, habilitados pelo respectivo órgão regulamentador de sua profissão (por exemplo: o CRM para os médicos). 2. Para acessar o conteúdo do aplicativo, o usuário precisa ser cadastrado no site Nutrição Infantil da Nestlé. Caso não possua cadastro, basta seguir os passos abaixo: a) Cadastre-se pela web para não consumir a banda 3G de seu aparelho. b) O cadastro no site é pessoal e válido para todos os outros sites Nestlé. Ou seja, com o mesmo cadastro, o usuário pode entrar em diferentes sites de produtos, marcas e serviços da Nestlé. Para mais detalhes, acesse http://www.nestlenutrition.com.br/app c) Efetuado o cadastro, o usuário terá acesso temporário ao Manual de Medicamentos até que seu cadastro seja validado pela equipe responsável da Nestlé. d) Caso o cadastro seja aprovado, o acesso será mantido. Em caso de desaprovação, o usuário perderá seu acesso ao aplicativo (esta restrição não impedirá o acesso aos demais sites Nestlé). e) Em caso de dúvida, é possível entrar em contato com o serviço ao consumidor pelo telefone 0800-7701599. 3. Só é possível acessar o conteúdo do aplicativo estando conectado à internet. Isso acontece porque os dados de login precisam ser validados com os dados cadastrados no site Nutrição Infantil. Como fazer o login 1. Preencha os campos de E-mail e Senha cadastrados no site Nutrição Infantil ou no Portal Nestlé. Em seguida, clique no botão “Entrar”. 2. A funcionalidade de Login Automático serve para que você não precise preencher o login sempre que tiver fechado o aplicativo. Para ativá-la, é só clicar e habilitar o seu respectivo botão. 3. Caso não consiga lembrar sua senha cadastrada, clique no botão “Esqueci minha senha”. Você será direcionado para o site Nutrição Infantil, onde deverá informar seu e-mail ou CPF. Em seguida, uma mensagem com os seus dados de acesso será automaticamente encaminhada para o seu e-mail. The Medicines Handbook commonly used in Pediatrics Child Nutrition Nestlé is a useful application for day to day health professionals, because it makes it fast and convenient to search for information. You can find several medications, organized by categories, active ingredients, generics and original. Furthermore it is possible to conduct a search for specific terms and to add those of interest in your area of ​​Favorites. Download the app now available for Android phones, and have at your fingertips all the necessary information regarding the most commonly used drugs in pediatrics. The content of this application is restricted to health professionals registered on the site www.nestlenutrition.com.br. Here's what you need to do to register and access the application. About access 1. Application content is exclusively for health care professionals, enabled by their regulatory body for your profession (eg CRM for doctors). 2. To access the contents of the application, the user needs to be registered on the site of Nestle Infant Nutrition. If you have no registration, just follow the steps below: a) Join the web not to consume your band 3G handset. b) The registration on the site is personal and valid for all other Nestlé websites. Ie, with the same registration, the user can enter different websites of products, services and brands of Nestlé. For more details, visit http://www.nestlenutrition.com.br/app c) Effected registration, the user will have temporary access to Medicines Handbook until your registration is validated by the team responsible for Nestlé. d) If the registration is approved, access will be maintained. In case of disapproval, the user will lose their access to the application (this restriction does not prevent access to other Nestlé sites). e) In case of doubt, you can contact customer service by phone 0800-7701599. 3. You can only access the contents of the application being connected to the internet. This is because the login data need to be validated with the data registered on the site Child Nutrition. How to login 1. Fill in the e-mail address and password registered with the site or the Child Nutrition Nestle Portal. Then click the "Login" button. 2. Automatic Login functionality is so that you do not need to fill in the login when you closed the application. To activate it, just click and enable your respective button. 3. If you can not remember your password registered, click on the "Forgot Password". You will be directed to the Child Nutrition website, where you should enter your e-mail or CPF. Then a message with your data access will be automatically forwarded to your email.

description: With The Piano you have the opportunity to become familiar with the workings of a piano , and the use of notes. The app is a learning application that was developed for schools and private music lessons, but also for private use . The Piano has an editor , with which you can compose whole songs. It is possible to load individual songs and store , as well as the content of the image to share with other applications (eg e- mail). There is also a quiz can be found at the tasks for finding sheet music on the piano. This is not a commercial app , but originated as a pet project in close collaboration with the music teacher at a school in Berlin(Germany) . We have tried leaving out any games clean and focused on the essentials. The application has already proven this in music class and discovered also well received by the students. As a teacher, one has the option to present using a projector or TV, the app pupils and so involve them in teaching music with , with the application via touch , as well as mouse and keyboard can be controlled. The Piano is / remains free and is given for evaluation. Suggestions for improvement are always welcome welcome.

description: Note: ♦ You will need Wi-Fi connectivity to download and use this app. ♦ Please install Adobe Air on your device before launching the app. You can download the latest version of Adobe Air from below link. http://goo.gl/XQL3pW App best viewed in landscape mode. ♦ Do you know which city are you in? Do you know in which city you were born? Learn about different cities of the United States of America with the app Map Me. This app promotes interactive and independent learning of receptive and cognitive skills. WebTeam Corporation has taken the initiative to teach children on the spectrum about their own cities in a very simple way. Different colors are shown to differentiate the cities. The app is developed by WebTeam corporation. ***About WebTeam Corporation*** Incorporated in 2005, WebTeam Corporation is a Somerset-based mobile application development firm that has pioneered the development of an autism management program comprising screening, assessment and intervention apps. WebTeam’s ABA-based autism apps help parents, teachers, health care experts, researchers and other stakeholders worldwide efficiently manage the entire life-cycle of autism from infancy to adulthood and employment. By developing apps for autism intervention, WebTeam replicates individualized autism services on mobile devices, thereby making these necessary services available to the under-served population globally, especially in countries that lack the expertise necessary to tackle autism efficiently and in a cost-effective manner. WebTeam’s innovative idea backed by proprietary technology, which was awarded by Verizon in the 2013 Powerful Answers Award competition, lets caregivers collect and share data efficiently to foster effective collaborations that will ultimately solve one of the world’s largest and growing developmental disorders. *** About ABA *** As we know, the recommendation of 40 hours per week of ABA programming as employed by Lovaas’s study has been cited by many parents as being vital to their child’s success. The National Research Council’s 2001 report (p. 184) summarizes the skills necessary for implementing an effective ABA program as: “Teachers must be familiar with theory and research concerning best practices for children with autistic spectrum disorders, including methods of applied behavior analysis, naturalistic learning, incidental teaching, assistive technology, socialization, communication, inclusion, adaptation of the environment, language interventions, assessment, and the effective use of data collection systems. Specific problems in generalization and maintenance of behaviors also affect the need for training in methods of teaching children with autistic spectrum disorders. The wide range of IQ scores and verbal skills associated with autistic spectrum disorders, from profound mental retardation and severe language impairments to superior intelligence make the need for training of personnel even greater.”

description: GPS АнтиРадар работает как радар-детектор и предупредит Вас о стационарных камерах (камеры контроля скорости) и радарах ДПС на Вашем пути. Если при приближении к камере Ваша скорость будет выше разрешенной более чем на 19 км/ч, то приложение будет подавать предупреждающие звуки. А это важно, т.к. теперь штраф за превышение на >20 км/ч уже начинается с 500 рублей. Карта с камерами в нашей базе - http://map.gpsantiradar.info/ *** Хорошая новость! *** Теперь есть бесплатная версия GPS АнтиРадар. Вы можете оценить и протестировать программу на вашем устройстве и в своем городе абсолютно бесплатно - http://goo.gl/u7Z7AJ Приложение работает с помощью известных данных о расположении стационарных камер и радаров ДПС (такие как Стрелка или Старт СТ) и других объектов. Есть возможность добавить недостающие камеры вручную и синхронизация их между пользователями! Вам не нужно ждать пока мы добавим камеры, она пополняется просто и удобно самими пользователями! Настоящий радар-детектор, конечно, работает надежнее, но и стоит более чем в 100 раз дороже этого приложения. GPS АнтиРадар может работать в фоне, т.е. вы можете использовать его совместно с навигатором. Сообщения о камерах или постах ДПС будут выводиться с помощью голосовых уведомлений. Внимание! GPS АнтиРадар - это ваш помощник, но не гарант отсутствия штрафов, т.к. новые камеры могут не сразу попадать в базу данных. Пожалуйста, соблюдайте правила дорожного движения. В настоящий момент приложение содержит карту камер и радаров для: – России Наша группа ВКонтакте - http://vk.com/public59336195 Официальная страница Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/pages/%D0%90%D0%BD%D1%82%D0%B8%D0%A0%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%B0%D1%80/201419256701196?fref=ts Здесь вы можете оставить свои пожелания, комментарии, информацию о недостающих камерах и т.д. --------------------------------------------------------- Часто задаваемые вопросы: 1. Приложение не может найти GPS сигнал. Что делать? Работа GPS зависит от многих факторов, в том числе погоды. Многие программы, например навигации, используют кроме GPS, GSM триангуляцию по сотовым вышкам (мы ее не используем в виду большой погрешности). – Выйдите на открытое пространство. GPS сигнал не будет найден в квартире или другом закрытом помещении. – Убедитесь, что модуль GPS включен. При включении GPS АнтиРадар в панели событий Android должно появиться системное уведомление о работе GPS. – Попробуйте выключить и заново включить GPS модуль. 2. Отсутствует звуковое оповещение. Что делать? – Убедитесь, что громкость всех типов уведомлений установлена на максимум. Найти эту настройку можно по следующему пути: откройте стандартные настройки Android -> Звук -> Громкость. – Убедитесь, что в GPS АнтиРадар не установлен чекбокс "только скорость". Это позволит воспроизводить звук не нарушая ПДД. – Проверьте работу проехав рядом с камерой. Как только на экране появляется тип камеры и скорость ограничения этой камеры должен прозвучать звуковой сигнал. – При подключении устройства к магнитоле автомобиля с помощью Bluetooth, убедитесь, что другие приложения могу воспроизводить звуковые уведомления. 3. Я раньше использовал бесплатную версию и затем купил Premium, но приложение не изменилось / Я не могу установить Premium версию – Пожалуйста, удалите все предыдущие версии и поставьте еще раз Premium с GooglePlay по ссылке https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=air.StrelkaSD. 4. Сняли деньги два раза. Почему? – Это особенность работы Google Play, как правило они в тот же день возвращают деньги сами, без дополнительных действий. Наше приложение не занимается какими-либо операциями с деньгами. GPS radar detector works like a radar detector and alert you to the stationary cameras (speed cameras) and radar DPS on your way. If you are approaching the camera, your speed will be higher than allowed by more than 19 km / h, the application will serve warning sounds. And this is important because Now the penalty for excess> 20 km / h already starts from 500 rubles. Map with cameras in our database - http://map.gpsantiradar.info/ *** Good news! *** Now there's a free version of GPS radar detector. You can evaluate and test the program on your device and in your city absolutely free - http://goo.gl/u7Z7AJ The application works with the known data on the location of fixed cameras and radar DPS (such as arrows or Start PT) and other objects. It is possible to add the missing camera and manually synchronize them between users! You do not need to wait until we add the camera, it is easy and convenient updated by the users themselves! This radar detector, of course, works reliably, but it also costs more than 100 times the price of this app. GPS radar detector can work in the background, ie, you can use it in conjunction with the navigator. Posts about cameras or traffic police posts will be displayed with voice notifications. Warning! GPS radar detector - this is your assistant, but not warranted to be free of fines, because New cameras can not immediately get into the database. Please observe the rules of the road. At the moment, the application contains a map of cameras and radars for: - Russia Our group VKontakte - http://vk.com/public59336195 Official page of Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/pages/%D0%90%D0%BD%D1%82%D0%B8%D0%A0%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%B0%D1%80/201419256701196?fref=ts Here you can leave your suggestions, comments, information about the missing camera, etc. -------------------------------------------------- ------- FAQ: 1. An application can not find a GPS signal. What to do? Work GPS depends on many factors, including weather. Many programs, such as navigation, use other than GPS, GSM triangulation on cell towers (we do not use it in view of the large error). - Get out into the open. GPS signal can not be found in an apartment or other enclosed area. - Ensure that the GPS module is switched on. When the GPS radar detector in the event of the Android system notification should appear on GPS. - Try to disable and re-enable the GPS. 2. There is no audible alarm. What to do? - Ensure that the volume of all types of notifications is set to maximum. Find this can be in the following location: Open the default settings Android -> Sound -> Volume. - Make sure that the GPS radar detector is not installed checkbox "only the speed." You can then play the sound without breaking the traffic rules. - Check the operation after passing next to the camera. As soon as the display shows the type of camera and speed limit of the camera you will hear a beep. - When connecting the device to the radio car using Bluetooth, make sure that other applications can play sound notifications.   3. I have previously used the free version, and then bought a Premium, but the application has not changed / I can not install the Premium version - Please remove all previous versions and put more time with Premium GooglePlay link https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=air.StrelkaSD. 4. They took the money twice. How Come? - This is a feature of Google Play, as a rule they are in the same day, the money will return, without further action. Our application is not engaged in any transactions with money.

A handy calculator to determine the new coordinates of a point using a known distance and bearing. Snowwhite plays the starring role in this game. In the winter a queen is sowing in her black window sill, it is snowing outside. The queen accidentally pricks herself in her finger, and three drops of blood fall in the snow. She makes a wish: she would like to have a child with skin white as snow, lips as red as blood and hair as black as the window sill. The queen gives birth to a girl and calls her Snow White, but shortly after the queen passes away. The king marries a new woman just a year later, this woman wants to be the most beautiful in the country, she asks her magic mirror every day: "Mirror, mirror, on the wall, who's the fairest of them all?" Every time the mirror reveals she is the most beautiful, until Snowwhite grows up to be a beautiful young woman. The queen can't stand it, she becomes furious. She calls for a hunter, the hunter is ordered to take Snow White into the forest and kill her there. The hunter lets Snow White get away because he doesn't want to kill her. Snow White finds a tiny house in the forest, in which she finds seven plates and seven cups on the table, and seven little beds. She is so tired she falls asleep in one of the beds. The seven dwarfs come home and see Snowwhite sleeping in one of their beds. When she wakes up they tell her she can stay if she keeps the house nice and clean, and if she make sure not to open the door for anyone but them! The queen is told by the mirror that Snowwhite is still alive. She transforms herself into an old lady, with beautiful red apples, and visits her. The apple is poisonous, but Snow White takes a bite anyway and falls to the floor. The dwarfs are overcome by sadness and grief when they come home and find her there. They make a glass coffin in which they lay Snow White to rest, they cry and cry. One day a prince passes the coffin and falls in love with the beautiful girl laying there. He asks the dwarfs if he can open the coffin to get a better look at her. The dwarfs carry the coffin down the hill, but it falls to the ground. The piece of apple Snow White swallowed shoots from her throat, waking her up! The prince asks if she wants to marry him, and she would love to. The prince takes Snow White to his castle, and the dwarfs can come visit them whenever they want! In this game you will get to know the whole story. Find the difference between the pictures and try to beat the high score!

Throughout time hypnotherapy has been said to aid the mind and body. relaxation – meditation – quit smoking – conquer fears – boost confidence – build self esteem – gain assertiveness – gain motivation – lose weight – sleep better – feel rested – boost self confidence – relieve stress – curb your anger – boost memory – attack anxiety – fight depression - relieve pain - regrow hair - bring peace - therapy - Hypnosis is a psychological state which resembles sleep but only superficially. It is believed that a hypnotic state of mind could have the potential to do all or none of these amazing things. This App is the classic spinning wheel we all associate with being hypnotized. Description Wordcraft is a new highscores word search puzzle game with 5 game modes, 2 languages English and Czech and over 170 000 possible words! SIMPLE LOOK BUT EXTREMELY ADDICTING WORD SEARCH GAME! Wordcraft is very similar to SpellTower, Scrabble, Anagrams, Clabbers but includes different rules and game modes! Get the best score possible and when you are ready to submit your score press THE RIGHT ARROW IN THE BOTTOM RIGHT CORNER! Prepare for the best word search game you have ever experienced! Facebook fan page: https://www.facebook.com/wordcraft1 ============== GAME MODES ======================= In Wordcraft you can play 6 different word search modes - Classic, Classic-5, Fastgame, Limited, 10 Words and Fairplay! Classic mode - Every word created from 4+/5+ letters will add new letters, otherwise the new letters are not added. Find as many words as you can! Press the right arrow in the bottom right corner to submit your score! Fastgame - no new letters added! Get the best score possible! Limited - you have 300 seconds to get the best score possible! Find as many words as you can! 10 Words - you have a limit of 10 words! Fair play - everybody gets the same letters and bonuses! =========== FEATURES =================== * gameplay similar to scrabble and SpellTower * 6 word search modes! * each game is different! * global highscores system, 6 different leaderboards, you are playing against people all around the world! * local highscores (saving your best score)! * huge word dictionary - over 170 000 possible words! * 2 languages - english and czech! In czech version you are searching for CZECH words! * addicting and challenging gameplay! * great tool to learn new words and english vocabulary! * great educational tool * word helper - you can use it to find better and longer words! * longer words = extra score! * 36 possible graphic layouts, that each player can create (in the main menu or during gameplay pressing C and L) * totally free word search game! How to play: Press on the letter and drag to select a word! The word must contain at least 3 letters! Please view HELP to see more game instructions and rules! Get the best score possible and when you are ready to submit your score press THE RIGHT ARROW IN THE BOTTOM RIGHT CORNER! Words can be created from 3-10 letters If you like this word search game please try also our other FREE WORD SEARCH HIGHSCORES games in our profile! Thank you and enjoy playing our game Wordcraft! Please do not forget to rate Wordcraft if you like it, it will help us improve the game!

Ask questions and find answers. Wondering what that thing is? Take a picture and ask on piQ Wondering how that thing works? Take a picture and ask piQ piQ is a social app where you can quickly and easily ask questions with pictures and find the answer. How it works: 1. You come across an object and you don't know what it is, or how it is used, or why it is there. 2. You open piQ and take a picture of the object 3. Wait a few minutes while others browsing the app sees your question and answer it. When someone answers your question, you will get a notification. While waiting for your answer you can also answer picture questions asked by other users. Users are invited to take pictures of objects and things that they come across or see in their everyday life but do not know what the object is or what it is used for. For example, a user can take a picture of a tree and ask, what type of tree is this? Other users of the app can then reply to the question with their answers. Answers can be voted by other users either up or down, the top rated answers are then shown on the top of the answers list. This is similar to the mechanism Reddit employs in their comment system to sieve out the good answers from the bad. Users can post pictures of almost anything they wish from "what is this bug called?" to "how is this tool used" In summary piQ is a question answer app powered by its users. It makes asking question very simple and quick.

akRDC - VNC viewer - Remote desktop control (Free version) If akRDC doesn't work for you, please ask for help through the “Send email" button in Google Play, we will certainly be able to resolve the problem. thank you. -> PRO Version : - Compressed files transfer stream - Compressed directory files list (with TightVNC server, akRDC PRO only) - Direct support. - No Ad -> The Free version displays an Advertisement at the application startup only. akRDC is a Remote Desktop Control software compatible with the RFB protocol (VNC Client) and tested on servers: TightVNC, UltraVNC, RealVNC (without encryption), Ubuntu Remote Desktop (servers ready with the RFB protocol...) * App languages: English, French, Russian, Italian, German, Espagnol, Japanese, Korean * Files Transfer (For TighVNC and UltraVNC servers only right now + X11VNC in Ultra VNC mode): - Transfer (download and upload) files and complete directories structure. - Compressed files transfer stream (akRDC PRO only). - Compressed directory files list (with TightVNC server, akRDC PRO only) - Create / Delete directories. - Delete files. * Supports UltraVNC repeater/proxy in mode 1 * Function keys: - connection shortcuts - 3 buttons mouse + wheel emulation (volume key) - keyboard, quick keys (CTRL+C, ...), - Esc (Back key) - special keys (F1, F2...), - Zoom - Drag&drop - network band optimization. - configuration Import / export - hardware acceleration management (if the remote session view become BLACK, you have to disable the hardware acceleration) * RFB Protocol implementation: - supports TIGH, RAW, COPYRECT, RRE, HEXTILE and ZRLE encodings. - VNC password (DES encrypted authentication). - MS-Logon authentication ( for UltraVNC server) How to use: install a VNC server (TightVNC recommended) on your PC, create a new connection shortcut in AKRDC then connect to your server. The documentation available on www.akrdc.eu To make the CTRL ALT DEL command works, run the VNC server as a service, and allow the CTRL ALT DEL feature in your system.

Let your child's brilliance soar through "Kids Brain Trainer". With "Kids Brain Trainer" your kid will be able to: ✔ Match an image to its shadow. ✔ Find the odd image in a collection of images. ✔ Match images to its families. ✔ Memory game; match cards. Completely safe and having NO ads, this game proves to be the best kids game to help your child grow, learn, have fun, and even give parents some time off. With four fun, colorful and educational sections, "Kids Brain Trainer (Preschool)" has 31 games specifically designed to contribute to, exercise and develop your child's motor and cognitive skills (such as visual attention, visual-spatial relations, short term memory, visual-motor coordination, bi-lateral coordination, tactile skills and much more). Developed by a preschoolers father and a child's mental development specialist, "Kids Brain Trainer (Preschool)" aims to be as educational and beneficial as possible; and being fathers themselves, these developers know how important -and tricky- it can be to keep children interested while learning. "Kids Brain Trainer (Preschool)" is updated at least twice a month with fun, new, graphics, puzzles and more to keep your little ones having fun! This highly educational app is not only designed for children 3+ (including special needs children), but also for any parents, teachers, or other professionals working in the field of child development. "Kids Brain Trainer (Preschool)" includes four fun-packed parts with a number of colorfully themed and leveled games: 1. Shadow: 8 mind-exercising levels of matching a figure to its shadow 2. Differences: 8 fun levels of identifying the image that does not belong 3. Match It!: 3 exciting games of matching a picture to the figure provided. 4. Memory: 12 colorful games of matching memory cards; each game of three difficulty levels: Easy, Medium and Hard. This educational game is truly developed with every child's best interest at heart and serves as an accurate way to access you child’s basic skills, as well as develop them. Forqan Smart Technology believes that by doing, playing and exploring, children learn best. Have your child develop essential motor and cognitive skills doing just that- doing, playing, exploring, and having endless fun with a safe game. Try our other FREE games: ★ Kids Puzzles: Match-1 ★ Kids Puzzles: Match-2 ★ Kids Puzzles: Match-3 ★ Memory: Brain Trainer ★ Kids University ★ Kids Garden ★ Math School ★ Math Memory Reveal your child's brilliance and help their brain grow- download "Kids Brain Trainer (Preschool)" today.

Bitcoin Alert / Price Watchdog Your device will receive push notifications via Google Cloud Messaging. Our servers are monitoring the live exchange rate from Bitstamp and pushing the alerts over the Google Cloud Messaging Architecture to your device (thus not draining your battery). Security This App only needs permission to trade and to view account infos, there is no way it can withdraw your money from the exchange. A lot of development is ongoing right now. Be prepared for even more features and bug fix releases in the coming weeks. Consider writing a short feedback to feedback@btcfx.ch instead of just giving a bad rating, it is very possible we're already aware of certain bugs. description: The free SwitzerlandMobility app is the perfect app for anybody who is out and about in Switzerland: - maps of Switzerland from swisstopo up to a scale of 1:25,000 (the best) - 32,000 km signposted non-motorized routes (national, regional and local) - complete network of signposted hiking trails (60,000 km) - 25,000 public transportation stops linked to the timetable of the Swiss Federal Railways (planning a tour with public transportation was never easier) - information on 4,500 points of interest on the way, such as overnight accommodations, bicycle service stations, etc. positioning system and compass function (you always know where you are) With SwitzerlandMobility Plus you can additionally - download and store swisstopo maps to be used in areas without network coverage (no more problems with dead zones) - download and store tours you designed, including elevation profile, hiking time, distance and altitude (separately and easily) Please note: - The app requires network coverage (useable without network coverage with SwitzerlandMobility Plus). - No tours can be entered with the app. Constant use of the GPS may considerably reduce the length of battery life. Requires a screen resolution of min. 480x320 pixels (HVGA) and multitouch. Unfortunately, the Samsung GT-S6102 or GT-S5570, among others, does not fulfill this requirement.

description: Valet remembers where you park so you don't have to. Set parking meter timers and street sweeping alarms. Never again get a parking ticket or forget where you parked your vehicle. The most elegant car locator app available. Exclusively for Android. ** Now utilizing new Google Play Services location API's to enable our unique automatic parking sensor! ** --- Reviews! -- Lifehacker - http://bit.ly/15uF6en VentureBeat - http://bit.ly/112tWrY Gizmodo App of the Day - http://bit.ly/Z6JoXA Tested - http://bit.ly/10KEiQ9 BeautifulPixels.com - http://t.co/nru8NEjkUV Features: * Enable our parking sensor or use Bluetooth or Car Docks to automatically set your parking location * Remember where you parked with our Find My Car feature and get turn by turn directions back to your vehicle * Save yourself a parking ticket with the built in parking timer * Set meter, time limits, and street sweeping reminders (by hour, daily, weekend, monthly) English | Español | Português | Deutsch | Italiano | Français | Русский язык | 中国 | 日本語 | 한국 | Suomi Now including Babel (babelsdk.com). Babel allows users to correct Valet's translations in the app. Also great for remembering the location of your bicycle, motorcycle, hotel, camping spot, or any other location you would like to easily return to later. Popular to use in massive airport parking lots, at the mall, or when parking downtown. Tell the app to "park my car" and it does the rest! ---------- Promotional images available at http://valetapp.co Design and Development by http://twitter.com/deffibaugh Icons courtesy of http://www.androidicons.com *** ROOTED PHONE USERS *** Valet requires Google Play Services. If you rooted your phone and blocked or removed Google Play Services the app will not work. If you email me I can help you fix things but the app will not be designed for devices that are not compatible with Google Play since the app is distributed on Google Play.

description: Diese App ist speziell für Fussball Trainer entwickelt worden. Hiermit können Sie im Handumdrehen Ihre individuellen Trainingspläne erstellen, Spielerdaten verwalten und vieles mehr... Hier sind die wichtigsten Punkte: - Verwalten von Spielern, Vereinen, Mannschaften, Saisons - Erstellen von Trainingspläne mit vielen vorgefertigten Übungen, weitere Übungen sind zubuchbar - Trainings- und Spieltermine können angelegt werden - Verwaltung von Spieler An- und Abwesenheit - Spielaufstellungen nach Trikotnummer und Spielsystem können mit Hilfe des Taktikboards adhoc angelegt werden - Spielereignisse können live dokumentiert werden - Eingabe von Regeln und Regelverstöße sind möglich - Auswertungen der jeweiligen Spieler zu allen eingegebenden Daten sind möglich - und vieles mehr Inklusive Taktikboard Mit diesem Zusatztool können man den Spielern schnell und einfach Taktische Tips anzeigen. Alle Daten sind Saisonal getrennt, daher kann die App langfristig genutzt werden. This app has been specially designed for football coaches. Allows you to create your personal training plans on the fly, manage player information and much more ... Here are the main points: - Manage players, clubs, teams, seasons - Creating training plans with many pre-made exercises, more exercises are bookable - Training and Schedules can be created - Management of player presence and absence - Match Lineups by jersey number and playing system can be created using the tactic boards adhoc - Game events can be documented live - Entry of rules and rule violations are possible - Evaluations of each player to all be released are possible - And much more Including tactics Board By using this additional tool, one can easily see the players Tactical Tips. All data are Seasonal separately, so the app can be used long term.

"Switch Widget" is a power saving widget on your home, which will provide the fastest way to turn on/off your hardware model, such as wifi, gps, flashlight, mobile data, brightness, bluetooth, screen timeout, battery indicator, lock screen and any setting options you want. "Switch Widget" is easy to use and completely ads free. You can add it on any launcher. "Switch Widget" is a "All Settings In One Widget" app. We believe that you will love it once you have it. ## How to add widget 1. Long press on your desktop; 2. Choose "Widgets"; 3. Click "(1x4)Switch" to add; ## What should I do if I cannot uninstall this app? 1. Open “Settings“ in Home; 2. Select “Location ＆ Security -> Select device administrators“; 3. Unchecked permission of Switch; 4. REMOVE Switch as normal;

Raiden Craft 1990: FINAL FIGHT is a FREE classical scrolling Sky Force SHOOTER arcade game In the year 2048, Earth has suddenly become the target of deranged aliens known as the Crana. Following the invasion, the World Alliance Military builds a new cutting-edge weapon, the Raiden Supersonic Attack Fighter. Based on a captured alien craft, it is humanity's only hope for survival. Raiden consists of eight vertical scrolling missions where the player maneuvers the Raiden craft dodging and destroying enemy robots, buildings, ground targets, and aircraft. There are bombs and missile powerups as well as collectable medals which add to the score. When player dies, the fighter's fragments become projectiles that damage enemies. After defeating the Stage 8 boss, the mission is completed, and player receives 1 million points for each completed loop. Afterwards, it will start back to Stage 1. This time around, enemies shoot faster and at a more rapid rate. The hottest shooter is no push over, but the invigorating gameplay and vast library of achievements will keep both casual players and hardcore gamers hooked as you upgrade your ship and take it a little deeper into the incredible battlefield time after time. FEATURES: ★ Beautiful levels with immersive missions to complete. ★ Multiple extreme boss battles. ★ Upgrade your shields, guns, missiles, lasers, mega-bombs and magnets. ★ Risk everything to rescue civilians. ★ Boost your final score with a host of in-game achievements. ★ Rescue fallen opponents to win extra lives and stars. ★ Accessible to beginners, as well as hardcore shooter addicts. ★ Full voiceover and incredible electronic soundtrack. ★ Seven gorgeous scenes,Vivid sound effect!

Babies and newborns need healthy bedtime schedules. Any new parent knows that it can be difficult realize, but there are tips that will help to soothe a baby and get her used to a nap and night time routine. Try playing 'Baby Sleep Lullabies Free' on your mobile phone and watch your kids fall into slumber in just a few minutes. Place your Android phone next to the crib and the soothing sounds for relaxation will make your kids doze off in no time. This playlist of bed time lullaby songs is perfect for toddlers or preschool children and they can become an ideal bedtime routine for every night. Some newborns and toddlers need soothing items to help them get to sleep. Lullabies and other baby soothers will help them stick to a routine. Some babies need to be rocked, other respond well to sleeping music or white noise. Bedtime in the evening is something that may seem elusive to newborns and new parents. It can take several months before an infant is ready to sleep for any length of time through the night. A "newborn baby" is programmed to wake about every two hours to be fed and have its diaper changed, as its schedule is set by its biological needs. Download 'Baby Sleep Lullabies Free' and you'll have the best combination of nursery rhymes and bedtime songs for children. These relaxing sounds and soothing lullabies for babies are ideal for parents as well as they are bound to secure a good night's rest and sweet dreams. Enjoy this great music for sleeping any time! Don't worry – all you have to do is get 'Baby Sleep – Kids Music Box', a top free app including some of the best lullabies for babies! Since the dawn of time, the benefits of live music and “songs for children” have been a key part of every child's development. Around the world, lullabies and children nursery rhymes pave the road to sleep and dreams, and they cultivate the innate musicality of babies. We know that listening to certain types of music can help adults calm themselves, too. We also know that singing promotes relaxation in adults, and may ease many of these negative emotions. Singing to your child, with or without the assistance of a recording, can improve the emotional state of both you and your baby. Therefore, get “Baby Sleep” – Kids Music Box free for your mobile phone and you'll have the most beautiful lullaby music for children. Why do people love lullabies? Oftentimes, they are familiar, easy-to-sing melodies that bring back positive associations and feelings. If Mama or Grandma sang lullabies to you as an infant, chances are you had no words to say 'I love it when you sing to me,' or 'I feel so safe and warm when you sing to me, please don’t stop' and yet when you hear that familiar tune, your body and mind gets those warm, safe, cuddly feelings. Lullabies form the earliest memories for children, and as adults we often remember the songs later in life. Many adults have said they don't remember childhood songs, yet when they become a parent the distant melody suddenly pops out of them as they rock and sing to their own little one. While for most parents lullabies are instinctive, some parents do not recognize how music can truly affect and influence their child not only as an infant, but throughout their childhood. description: Говорящие часы – это бесплатное приложение для Android, при помощи которого ваше устройство научится озвучивать текущее время. Интерфейс «Говорящих часов» отличается современным дизайном и приятным минимализмом. Вам не придется долго разбираться с функциональной частью, ведь она выполнена максимально просто и удобно, не вызывая затруднений даже у начинающих пользователей. Будьте уверены, что с этим приложением вы всегда будете в курсе самого точного текущего времени! Основные особенности приложения: - Крупная и постоянно растущая база качественных голосовых пакетов - Простой и интуитивно понятный интерфейс - Широкий спектр всевозможных настроек - Приятный и современный дизайн - Регулярные обновления Что стоит ожидать в новых версиях: - Большой набор новых звуков и дополнительных фраз - Функция будильника Talking Clock - a free application for Android, with which the device learns your voice the current time. With a rich set of options for the different programs can be fine customization. For example, you can enable alerts when the device starts up, choose the appropriate audio stream, set the desired frequency voice alert throughout the day or set the volume level, independent of the overall performance of the system. Interface "speaking clock" has a contemporary design and a pleasant minimalism. One does not have to deal with the functional part, because it is made as easy and convenient, without causing difficulties even for novice users. Be assured that with this app you will always be aware of the exact current time! Key features of the app: - Large and growing base of high-quality voice packets - Simple and intuitive interface - A wide range of possible settings - Nice and modern design - Regular updates What to expect in the new versions: - A large collection of new sounds and additional phrases - Alarm function

description: ♠ Test Your Memory with Cards ♠ Get the best card memory game to kill time and practice your memory skills! This is a new free matching game that offers plenty of fun for the whole family! Improve your memory and concentration with this cool mind game and challenge your friends to beat your score! ♦ Flip the cards and match the same pictures! ♣ From easy to hard difficulty levels ♦ Choose from 3x2, 4x3, 6x4, 7x4 and 8x4 tables! ♣ Single player and multiplayer mode! ♦ Cute pictures will keep the kids entertained and interested! ♣ Perfect brain game for children and adults! If your children love playing addictive and “fun games”, 'Test Your Memory with Cards' is a perfect gameplay for them as it will definitely keep them busy for hours. However, this great free game is more than just fun – it also offers you the opportunity to exercise your brain and concentration skills and helps you improve memory. Moreover, just like a puzzle game, this one is an excellent social game suitable to play with friends as it includes a multi-player mode. Therefore, download the app for free and be sure that you'll never get bored. Instructions to play this brain training game game: Here is where you need to use your memory: you have to find and match the identical playing cards. Click on the first card and then, click on the others to find the playing card that is identical to the first one, and so on. Memorize quickly all the turning cards! This way, you'll be able to find them much easier and faster! Memory is not just one of many intellectual skills, it is the most important. This is because it directly effects every other intellectual process. Improve your brain health and performance with our amazing brain game designed to exercise memory! Match same cards and have fun! This is not just a brain memory game for kids, it is also excellent for adults! The object of this mind game is to find all matching pairs of cards. It seems quite simple to play but it actually requires sharp visual-memory skills. Once you match a pair of cards, they will stay turned over (face up). You need to get all the cards turned over in order to get to the next level. Challenge your friends to beat your score or play together in the multi-player mode. It is known that when it comes to boosting your child’s memory nothing works better than memory games. They are known to improve memory in kids and that too in an enjoyable manner. Research has shown that learning new things, doing puzzles and playing games helps the mind stay active. The most effective "memory games" allow you to improve your memory capacity and practice abstract thinking. If you give these games a try you will definitely find them amazing and will soon be obsessed with them. Memory games for kids are the best way to help your children develop their thinking and logic skills! Not only that they'll have so much fun playing this match game, they'll also benefit a lot from it! Matching cute pictures will keep their attention while pairing them will exercise their memorizing skills at the same time! Kids will find most of the puzzles intersting and will enjoy playing each one of them. But their memorizing skills will benefit the most from playing card matching games! You can download these memory games for children from the market and help your child to develop this cognitive ability, memory and concentration, which will be very beneficial to him in the later stages of his life.

description: Note: Only Supports Those Video files containing AAC audio track. (generally, all of the modern mobile phones) Did u ever wonder why you had to carry a copy of your favorite video and audio file. Or, you have a Video file with you, and you wanted to only listen to audio, on your trip to office. This Software aims to extract the audio from your media files. On Demand. It simply extracts and prepares a completely valid aac audio file, in case the media file has the audio track encoded in aac format. And it is very fast. It also does not re-encode the audio, and the extracted audio file has no kind of quality loss. I wanted such an app, to strip audio, to listen while travelling, as listening to audio on your audio players, enables you to add additional effects as supported by your device, and its harder and waste of your device's battery to view videos. Almost all the modern devices record audio in aac format. and so this software can extract such audio tracks, and you can play them in music players. Note: Tested only with unprotected media, like those recorded on your phone, and those which are not protected by any kind of DRM. Note: Tested to work on Galaxy S2 GT-I9100

description: The Whistle Android Finder PRO is supreme Android finder (phone locator) application which helps many people locate their Android device with just a simple WHISTLE after losing it, forgetting it somewhere or being hidden somewhere in a room on a desk behind papers, in a briefcase or in a coat pocket etc. The free version of this application named Whistle Android Finder FREE (also available in Google Play) has reached nearly 2,000,000 downloads!! But now, after reading and taking into account more than 8,700 user comments, wishes, and suggestions, it is time to upgrade the application with new features, several important whistle engine improvements, a better user interface, customized notification melodies, lower battery consumption and much more. This is the story about how Whistle Android Finder PRO was born! Here are the main features of the Whistle Android Finder PRO : In contrast to the free, ad-supported version, the paid Whistle Android Finder PRO does not include any ads! Furthermore, the set of requested permissions is much lower now. Only the essential permissions are requested. Much lower battery consumption due to optimized whistle detection engine when compared to the Whistle Android Finder FREE. The application has been designed and strongly optimised in order to reduce battery drain as much as possible. Customized whistle notification sounds are supported in PRO version. Simply select any MP3 or M4A music and apply it as notification! Under the Whistle Android Finder PRO settings tab it is also possible to choose among 20 different very amusing preloaded audio notification sounds to notify the presence of the detected whistle! Whistle Android Finder PRO can be enabled or disabled under the settings tab. Just run the application and the settings tab will appear! Remember: Whistle detection is working ONLY when the device is sleeping (i.e. when the screen is OFF). Once enabled, Whistle Android Finder PRO will work even if you reboot your Android device! Of course, you can disable it under the settings tab at any time. It is possible to choose among 5 different whistle detection sensitivity levels! Whistle Android Finder PRO is just ready to adapt to any Android device regardless of the specifics of integrated acoustic components. Once your whistle sound is detected, the Android device will respond to your whistling with playback of preselected audio notification signal. Furthermore, the display of a "sleeping" Android device is illuminated in order to easily locate your device in your bag or in a dark room for example. Under the preferences tab a user can also select (and approve) the usage of maximum possible volume for audio notification regardless of current media volume settings. However, Whistle Android Finder PRO is designed to resume your current media volume when audio notification is not played. Whistle Android Finder PRO is based on sophisticated but computationally optimised Digital Signal Processing techniques to analyse captured audio signals from the environment and search for distinct time-frequency patterns of a typical human whistle. The incorporated DSP algorithm is not signal energy based, therefore this whistle detector is much more accurate and reliable than similar applications found elsewhere on Google Play. Remember, just whistle and your Android will respond!
release_text: New in Whistle Android Finder PRO version 5.0: (*) Added ANDROID 5.0 Support!! (*) Integrated brand new Battery Guard feature to save your battery! (*) Added 2 new notification sounds (*) Included brand new whistle detection engine with superior sensitivity (*) Added user-selectable haptic feedback feature (vibration) (*) Extended support for various Android devices and tablets (Google Nexus 7, Samsung Galaxy Tab 7 etc.)

description: AdyClock turns your phone into a digital desktop clock with several color themes and alarm. In one stroke, you can specify the alarm! Many options to set the alarm parameters! Beta version - in a short time will be added many new features. We look forward to your comments and wishes. Features: * Nice LCD display. Can choose from several color themes. * 12/24 hours format. * Adjustable time going off the display. * Optionally, turn on the airplane mode during night-time display screen. * Sunrise, sunset and moon phases. * SINGLE TOUCH ALARM! - The alarm can be set via a single pull of the display. * Alarm dialog in the same style with LCD display. * Predefined alarm profiles. * User-configurable alarms. * Optional types of vibration. * Many features will be added in next versions. * Widget that displays the current time and alarm time. Required permits: READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE Play music stored on your phone and SD card. RECEIVE_COMPLETED_BOOT After switching the phone is a need to re-start the alarm. WAKE_LOCK Allows you to keep the display lit regardless of the setting phone. READ_PHONE_STATE Determine whether a call is ongoing. Alarm clock waits for the call is finished. WRITE_SETTINGS Allows to work with system settings (such as switching airplane mode). COARSE_ACCESS_LOCATION, ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION Determining the position to view the sunrise and sunset. DISABLE_KEYGUARD Alarm dialog can be viewed through the lock screen.

Educational game for children customizable, allowing them to discover the sounds of animals, of musical instruments, of transport, or about their close environment of toys, of family, with tour on picture and sounds. See them become more alert, laugh, be surprised or frightened on hearing the sounds. An excellent application for very small children. This different languages of the game are: English, French, German, Spanish, Russian, Romanian and Chinese. Principles of the Functionality GAMES There are two distinct game modes: - Discovery Mode Images discovery. Select a game group, and touch a miniature image, to obtain an enlarged image with its name pronounced, text and sound corresponding to the image. Touch the screen again to return to the game group. - Playful Mode Game understanding Select a game group. The child is asked to touch a particular miniature image in the game group. The child obtains applause if this is the correct answer. The child also obtains an enlarged image with the name pronounced, text, and the sounds corresponding to the image. OPTION The option menu allows you to change the appearance of the game. - Change the language - Display the name of the selected photo - Pronounce the name of the photo on opening the selected photo - Play the sound associated - Show score result for learning mode - Manage the images displayed in a game group according to the preferences of the child ADD MY PHOTOS This section allows you to create your own game groups using your own photos To do this, first select an image to define the game group, then for each of the 12 images in the group, you may select a photo, the sound and a text. For example for a game group of the family, you would select a photo of the father with an appropriate sound , and the text ´†Daddy†ª BUY A GAME GROUP This section allows you to buy a new game group -A game group of a given theme -A blank game group for you to create your own theme For each game group, you can preview its contents and the price. Some game groups may be purchased through recommendations in Facebook/twitter or through personal SMS recommendations.

description: Create SLIDESHOWS from your photos and add music and share them with your friends and family right from your smartphone! Thus it frees up your phone memory and battery power is saved. We DO NOT STORE your photos. They are deleted automatically after the slideshow is created. Slideshows are deleted in 3 days. SUPPORT Your feedback on Google Play is very important for us but we cannot provide support via these comments. description: אפליקציית OTO - חובה בכל אוטו - גרסת בטא, Beta Version חינם גלאי מכמונות מהירות אוטומטי אצלכם בטלפון ! כולל כל המכמונות החדשות ומתעדכן אוטומטית באופן קבוע האפליקציה מזהירה בחיווי קולי וויזואלי אם התקרבתם לאחת ממצלמות המהירות שבמאגר ואתם מעל המהירות המותרת. סעו בזהירות ומנעו התראות! אפליקציית OTO הינה אפליקציה ישראלית חדשה וחכמה במיוחד. היא "זוכרת" בעצמה (ללא צורך של כל התערבות שלכם) את המקום שבו חניתם ויודעת לכוון אתכם חזרה לרכבכם (במידה ולא חניתם בחניון תת קרקעי). האפליקציה מציגה שרות ייחודי אשר שומר על מיקום רכבכם בזמן החנייה באופן אוטומטי בשרת של אנגוג כך שתמיד תוכלו למצוא אותו. הערה: עדיין יש פספוסים של זיהוי מקום החניה. בקרוב נוציא update עם שיפורים. זוהי אפליקציה מגניבה בעברית שכדאי שתהיה במכשירכם, רק למקרה הצורך... בנוסף אפליקציית OTO מציעה את היכולות הייחודיות הבאות: -חניונים – מידע עדכני על חניונים, מחירים ומיקומם (כולל חניונים בחינם בתל אביב!, בקרוב בעוד ערים) -אזורי חניה – מפת אזורי החניה לפי תו אזורי ברחובות תל אביב -בתי קפה בתל אביב (בקרוב בעוד ערים) – האפליקציה מציגה בתי קפה מומלצים ומיוחדים שבחרנו במיוחד עבורכם תוכלו לנווט לחניון/בית קפה או כל נקודה אחרת על ידי לחיצה עליו ובחירת"Waze" המידע באפליקציה מתעדכן באופן קבוע. צפו לקבל גרסאות מעודכנות ותזכו למידע ויכולות אטרקטיביות נוספות. שימו לב!: אנא אפשרו את ה- GPS ואת אופציית "שימוש ברשת אלחוטית למציאת מיקום" לצורך הפעלת גלאי המצלמות ומציאת מיקום הרכב. מלבד זאת הפעלת ה- GPS האוטומטית עבור זיהוי המכמונות מותנית בכך שהטלפון מחובר למטען בכדי לא לבזבז סוללה. הערה חשובה: הגרסה הנוכחית הינה גרסת בטא של האפליקציה. אם נתקלתם בבעיה, או אם יש לכם הצעות לשיפורים – אל תהססו לפנות אלינו. בנוסף: במספר דגמים האפליקציה אינה עובדת. אנחנו מצטערים על כך ועובדים קשה בימים אלו על מנת לאפשר שימוש באפליקציה עבור דגמים אלו. בכל ענין אנא צרו קשר איתנו במייל info@anagog.com (תגיות: מכמונות מהירות, אפליקציות חדשות מגניבות, אפליקציה ישראלית, אפליקציה בעברית, חנייה בתל אביב, איפה הרכב, איפה חניתי, חניון, וייז, מפה, ניווט, בתי קפה, מומלץ, חינם, רגלי, חדש, מצלמות, משטרה, אוטומטי, חיישן waze, parking, find, car, automatic, sensors, map, israel, tel aviv, tlv, coffee, driver, speedcam, alert, navigate, new, cheap) Application OTO - a must in every car - Beta, Beta Version Free Auto radar detectors in your phone! Including any new cameras and automatically updated regularly The application warns voice and visual indication if Htkrbtm one speed cameras in the database and you are over the speed limit. Drive carefully and prevent alerts! Application OTO is a new Israeli application and smart. It "remembers" its own (without the need of your intervention) the place where you parked and knows how to direct you back to your car (if you parked in an underground garage). Application presents a unique service which keeps your car while parking location automatically on the server of Angog so you can always find it. Note: there are still Candid parking space detection. Soon we'll update with improvements.   This is a cool app should be on your phone in Hebrew, but just in case ... In addition to application OTO offers the following unique capabilities: - Parking lots - updated information on parking lots, prices and location (including free parking in Tel Aviv!, Soon other cities) - Parking area - map of the parking areas by regional character streets of Tel Aviv - Cafes in Tel Aviv (soon in cities) - app shows recommended cafes and specialty chosen especially for you You can navigate the park / cafe or any other point by clicking on it and selecting "Waze" Application information is updated regularly. Watch get updated versions and you will learn and more attractive capabilities. Attention!: Please let the the GPS and the option "wireless network for location" to operate the detector cameras and finding location of the vehicle. Besides running the automatic GPS for detection cameras conditioned phone is connected to a charger to not waste battery. Important note: The current version is a beta version of the application. If you encounter a problem, or if you have suggestions for improvements - do not hesitate to contact us. In addition: the number of models in the application does not work. We are sorry about this and are working hard these days to allow use application for these models. description: Lisez investir soi-même en 30 minutes sur votre smartphone ou tablette avec cette appli gratuite ‘Apprendre la bourse’. Le cours ‘Apprendre la bourse’ convient parfaitement à la bourse pour les nuls et s’adresse aussi au traders expérimentés. Après avoir suivi le cours, vous pouvez aller trader en bourse en ligne dans les indices comme le CAC 40. Aucune connaissance préalable sur le trading n’est requise. Avec cette appli, vous apprenez à acheter des actions et vous pouvez trader avec le course de la bourse. Bref, ce cours ‘Apprendre la bourse’ s’adresse à tout qui s’intéresse aux investissements. Dans le cours ‘Apprendre la bourse’, vous apprenez à acheter des actions sur la bourse en ligne avec des petits montants à partir de 100 euros. On appelle cela aussi le trading CFD. Lors du trading CFD (Contract for Difference), deux parties (l’acheteur et le vendeur) concluent un contrat. On échange ici la différence entre le prix à l’ouverture et le prix à la clôture d’un contrat. CFD est un instrument de placement avec un effet de levier vous permettant, en tant qu’investisseur, de tirer un avantage financier, tant avec un cours en hausse, qu’avec un cours en baisse. Grâce au levier, vous pouvez acheter plus d’actions en bourse avec CFD qu’avec un investissement traditionnel. Par étape, vous trouvez un exemple pratique afin de pouvoir faire le lien clair entre la théorie et la pratique. De cette manière vous apprenez à comprendre la bourse. Le cours se base sur un cours en direct qui se tient avec des dizaines de participants. Le cours ‘Apprendre la bourse’ comporte les parties suivantes: Etape 1: Trader en général Etape 2: Négocier via un broker Etape 3: Faire des bénéfices avec le trading en ligne Etape 4: La gestion de vos risques Etape 5: Cas pratiques Etape 6: Commencer à négocier en ligne À la fin du cours, vous pouvez choisir parmi une série de brokers en ligne et commencer directement à placer de l’argent fictif ou réel en créant un compte gratuit. Ensuite, vous pouvez directement acheter des actions du CAC 40 par exemple. Read invest yourself in 30 minutes on your smartphone or tablet with this free app 'Learning scholarship. The course 'Learning scholarship' is perfect for the purse for Dummies and also for the experienced traders. After completing the course, you can go online stock trader in indices such as the CAC 40. No prior knowledge of trading is required. With this app, you learn how to buy stocks and you can trade with the race purse. In short, this course 'Learning Scholarship' is open to all who are interested in investments. In the course 'Learning scholarship', you learn how to buy stocks online trading with small amounts from 100 euros. This is called as CFD trading. When trading CFD (Contract for Difference), both parties (buyer and seller) enter into a contract. Here we exchange the difference between the opening price and the closing price of a contract. CFD is an investment instrument with a leverage allows you, as an investor, for financial gain, as with rising prices, with a falling prices. With leverage, you can buy more shares traded with CFD with a traditional investment. By step, you will find a practical example in order to make a clear link between theory and practice. In this way you learn to understand the stock market. The course is based on an online course which is held with dozens of participants. The course 'Learning grant' includes the following parts: Step 1: Trader in general Step 2: Negotiate through a broker Step 3: Make profits with online trading Step 4: Managing Your Risk Step 5: Case studies Step 6: Start Trading Online At the end of the course, you can choose from a number of online brokers and immediately start placing the fictitious or real money by creating a free account. Then you can directly buy shares in the CAC 40, for example.

A Vet Tool is the perfect app for veterinarians, vet technicians, anyone working in the veterinary field, veterinary students, or anyone that is just interested in more information about the drugs and tests used at a vet clinic. By downloading A Vet Tool you are getting five fully featured applications. The five applications are accessible through an easy to use tab based interface. - The first application is a complete small animal (cat and dog) drug formulary with over 650 drugs. The drugs can be accessed quickly with the android fast scroll or by using the search function. Each drugs lists the indications and appropriate drug dosages in a format perfectly suited for the Android Platform. When compared to the price of a printed pocket formulary this function alone makes A Vet Tool a great value! - The second application contains common blood value lab results for birds, cats, cattle, dogs, ferrets, guinea pigs, horses, and turtles. - The third application is a collection of x-ray comparisons such as a good knee versus an OA knee. - The fourth application contains nine calculators: • Math calculator with memory function, the memory is saved even when the app is exited. • Conversion calculator that performs common conversions that a veterinary professional must do on a daily basis. It includes weight units (Kg, gram, mg, μg, ounce, lb), liquid units (Liter, dL, mL, ounce, tsp, tbsp, cc) and temperature units (Fahrenheit, Celsius, Kelvin). • Age calculator which takes a birth date as the input and outputs the age in years, months, weeks, and days. • Gestation calculator which can calculate the estimated birth date of several different species. • Fluid rate calculator which can calculate the ml/hour for fluids. • Dosage calculator to calculate how much mg of a drug should be given based on the patient's weight. • Body surface area calculator for dogs and cats. • Energy Requirements calculator for dogs and cats. • Transfusion calculator to determine the volume of donor blood needed - The fifth application is a great notepad. Notes can be added, deleted, and edited at any time. A Vet Tool was created with the assistance of several veterinary professionals and will provide anyone in the veterinary field or interested in the veterinary field a great value for their Android Device.

description: This app shows you the best sales on the Play Store , Steam , PSN (Playstation Store), Xbox (360 and One), GOG (former Good Old Games) and Origin . You will see the Games Bundles (Humble Bundle, Indie Gala, Bundle stars, Indie royale) too . You will found all the sales of apps & games for your Android device, all the sales of the Steam store (for PC games and apps), for your Playstation devices on PSN (PS3, PS4, PSVita, PSP), for you Xbox devices (Xbox One or Xbox 360), the games on GOG or the games on the Origin platform (by Electronic Arts), and the Bundles of Games. You can filter the deals displayed based on the download count or by the percentage of reduction. By clicking on the developper's name, you can list all the apps from this developper. Price history The price history of the app is displayed, which tells you the price changes in the past, if the price had been lower, how long ago and at which price. Follow list / Watchlist You can manage a "follow" list to be notified when a specific app is on sale. It's like your wishlist. To follow an app from the Play Store, Steam, PSN, Xbox, GOG or Origin website, use the "share" button and select "best app sale" to open the page of this app on best app sale. You will find the follow button and the price history. You can also use the search function. Other functionalities - Sort by date of discount, popularity, discount, release date - You can choose the country (thus the currency) and the language of the store - You can see ended sales - Share the sales to your friends - Nearly all apps and game are available in best app sale ! All the best price cut, price reduction are available in the app. You will miss no deals, no game or app that is on sale. Best App Sale will be the best friend of your wallet, for the best app on sales but also for the best games on sale. If you would like to buy a package of multiple games for a really low price, the functionnality to list the bundles of games will let you buy multiples games for as low as 1$ (by example) !
release_text: Version 2.51 - Added the steam packages - Little improvement in description displaying in Android Version 2.50 - You now have a listing of games bundles (Humble Bundle, Indie Gala, Bundle stars, Indie royale) - Open automatically the keyboard when you star a search - For GOG, added countries: Brasil (in $), Japan (in $), Germany (in €) and German language - Bug fixes Version 2.44 - The filter to list only games, dlc etc is also available for Gog and Origin - Stability fixes

Find out the details of the BMTC Bus numbers. Select the BMTC numbers and the route details (source,destination), route length and the number of trips information is shown. Route plans have been provided. Version 6 of the application has route plans updated by minimum number of hops for any of the locations across Bangalore. description: HP Anywhere is a holistic, multiplatform solution for mobilizing your IT workforce. Built of mini-apps from four HP solutions, it lets you deliver excellent user experience and consistent look and feel across IT applications, increasing productivity and reducing training needs. You can personalize mini-apps by user persona, and centralized security and administration eliminate the need to configure multiple servers and ports. Everything is controlled from one point, and a repository makes applications and updates instantly available to users. Key Features & Benefits: • State-of-the-art, device optimized user experience • Just right amount of data that meets exact needs of personas • Enables the access to multiple mobile applications from a single client • Multiple mobile platform and forms support enables device choice • Zero device-side admin through streamlined delivery

A very simple to use Automatic Call Recorder app. Just install and forget. Each call whether incoming or outgoing will be recorded seamlessly. An intuitive interface ensures that the calls recorded are displayed in a list with inbuilt media player. The recordings can be setup automatically to be backed up using Dropbox. Features: 1. Auto recording incoming and outgoing calls 2. You can see call details for particular recorded calls 3. Enable/Disable auto call recording 4. Turn on/off notification while recording call 5. You can manage count of recording calls (Mange Inbox size) 6. You can change file type of call to be recorded 7. Mange black list that you want to ignore recording for particular contacts 8. Mange audio source 9. You can ignore all contacts OR can ignore black listed contacts for auto recording 10. Mange ignore contact list 11. Auto Sync with Dropbox Cloud Sync *Please note that recording might not work on some phones. This is a hardware limitation. On some phones it might only record the incoming voice and not outgoing voice.
