This program opens a VPN connection through the bluetooth channel and implement reverse DUN features. It requires BlueDUN installed and running on the host device or a GPRS modem/phone with an available BT DUN profile. This app works ONLY IF your device can manage VPN connections, in particular if the TUN.KO module is present. This module strictly depends on the hardware and must be compiled specifically for it. Some manufacturers prepare the firmware without re-compile that module or they even remove the file, so, it is not possible to open a VPN and not possible to use apps for the VPN (like OpenVPN or DroidVPN); please take a look to this link: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.aed.tun.installer INSTALLATION: 1. Create the BT pairing between this client device (with BlueVPN installed) and the host device 2. Make sure you have a valid internet connection and the BT-DUN profile on host; if necessary install the BlueDUN app 3. Create a new VPN L2TP connection on client device, set "BlueVPN" as name and the VPN server equals to "127.0.0.1" 4. In case of direct modem connection (no Android phones) insert in the setting panel, the dial phone number, the access point and the other connection parameters NORMAL USAGE: 1. Enable the wifi/mobile data connection on client (required only to allow the VPN connection opening, but not used for data transfers) 2. Activate the bluetooth interface or open the BlueDUN app on host device 3. Open the BlueVPN app on client, click the host name in the BT device list 4. If BlueVPN does not connect automatically (Honeycomb), start it manually from the system settings (set any username and password) 5. While BlueVPN is connected you can open a browser and navigate the internet throught the bluetooth tethering NOTE - there are applications that cannot retrieve network data from the VPN connection due to an Android bug ( http://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=33666 ), please refer to the following list: WORK FINE: - GMail - Email [ POP3 / IMAP ] - Google+ - Facebook - Twitter - You Tube - Google Earth - Google Maps - Google Play (browse only) - Google Goggles - Kindle app - eBay app - SoundHound - Web Navigation (Chrome/Firefox/Dolphin...) DON'T WORK: - Google Play download - Skype - Zedge - Tune In If you like this application please make a video and post it on youtube to show how it works to other users
release_text: - solved the disconnection issues - added the client interface for no Android modem/phones (reverse DUN) - added the Modem compatibility option At the moment, this app requires a Wi-Fi connection to start-up the VPN. I'm working to bypass this limitation. For Honeycomb devices disconnect the VPN before stop the BlueVPN app (possible system crash otherwise), for other Android versions the VPN should disconnect automatically when exit the app.

description: The Brew Timer is for brewers, professional and amateur alike, who need a better way to keep track of their brew during the brew day. The application allows the brewer to create individual entries for the timing of different brewing events like the addition of hops, spices, a wort chiller, etc. These events can also include a post-boil steeping time, allowing brewers to keep track of additional lengths of time after the boil ends. These events can be grouped together as a Brew Session and can be saved to device memory in a Recipe Profile that can then be loaded when needed for future use. Each Recipe Profile contains all the events needed for a complete brew session. Brew Timer Features: - Create, save, load, and delete multiple Recipe Profiles. - Each Recipe Profile can contain events for all timed brewing processes. - The Brew Timer can sound a user selected alarm and/or vibrate when an event needs your attention. - Events can be added, edited, or removed while the the timer is running in case a modification needs to be made on the fly. - Color-coding of individual event entry’s remaining time lets you quickly determine how soon an event will trigger. - The Brew Timer can be paused and resumed at any time. The Brew Timer is also great for timing coffee roasting, baking or anything else you may need to keep track of multiple timing events. Is there something you would like to see in The Brew Timer? I have a list of other desired features that other brewers have emailed me, send me an email and tell me what you want! ( brewtimer@humanjoe.com )
release_text: 0.9.47 - Found a couple of small bugs that were setting off event alarms at wrong time. It was annoying so I wanted to get a fix out quickly. 0.9.46 - Added code to allow the event alarms to be heard while on a phone call. - Added a new feature that lets the user enable a Pre-Event Notification. A Pre-Event Notification is an alarm that occurs a set number of seconds before an actual event happens allowing the user to prepare. - Added ability to adjust the font size of on screen text.

Catch up with the fun of challenging your friends and strangers in a classic playoff via ‘Candies with friends’. Brag about your candy matching skills as you engage in multiple two-minute candy matching duels. Swap the positions of delicious candies on the screen, create a combination of three or more of the identical candies and blowout the matching candies. Add the dose of sweetness in your friendship through this innovative variation. It's a different game every time! Enjoy the candylicious adventure in this social candy matching game!! Features: - Fast paced gameplay - all the rounds are configured in a blitz type mode - Amazing power ups to supercharge your scores - Make matches while new candies and toffees fall into place - Super polished user interface and graphics with over the top effects - Challenge your friends, random opponents or challenge yourself in light practice mode - In-game chat feature to stay in touch with friends and brag about your score - Betting feature against opponents for each playoff to spice off things - Game design awards engaged users and ensures they never have to engage in In App Purchases by providing ample virtual currency in each session - Mission and challenges introduced each week to bring in new variations in the form of double blockers, collectible items, special candies, toffee, marshmallows, pinatas, doughnuts and so on. - Weekly and all time - Global and social leader boards to give you your bragging rights It’s not another knockoff of Candy Crush Saga. Candies with friends recreates the magic of the famous game without engaging in coercive monetization or forcing players into getting stuck on a single level for days on end. In addition, the playoff’s with your pals provide for engaging conversation topics when you decide to ramp up your social quotient. Stay tuned for some more delicious features in our future updates and support us by sending us feedback and ratings. More: Hurry! It’s time to make some fabulous moves! Time to boast your candy matching ability in a piñata blitz mode. Enjoy 'Candies with friends' in a virtual piñata scenario where you can challenge your buddies without any restriction and limitation.Sweeten up your friendship in a candied encrusted sessions with pals. You proceed with a simple mission to swap candies and blowout the similar brightly linked identical candies and combine a trio or more to create special candies in a blitz format limited by both the number of moves and time. Make flamboyant trio or pairs of five identical toffees and challenge your pals. In the meantime you are helped by special bombs, extra moves and freeze power ups. Its our belief that if you have enjoyed crushing candies or matching jewels and jams you will definitely fall in love with this novel social candies matching game. Its time to cherish your friendship, celebrate in piñata, challenge your friends and share your candies. Swap Candies! Swap Fun!! My Valentine Live Wallpaper will give a colorful and romantic touch to your Smartphone with your preferred picture inside a frame, multiple floating hearts and a text of your choice. description: Bombs On Apples free is our 1473labs first Game Live Wallpaper! If you like this live wallpaper, please help the developer efforts by making donations and by purchasing the full version. === GAME FEATURES === Tap the flying Droids to drop the bomb and try to shoot the jumping apples. If you shoot them all, you’ll get to the next level. If the Droid is RED, it is reloading and it cannot drop the bomb. You can play 5 levels for each stage (easy, medium, hard) At the game start, the default level is set on the first easiest level. In the settings you can select the first level of another stage(e.g. medium or hard). At the easy stage the apples don’t grow again when destroyed. At the medium stage, the destroyed apples reappear very slowly and in a transparent way: it is not possible to remove them until they begin to jig – you can pass the level even if they are on the screen. At the hard stage, the apples reappear quickly (only Full Version). You can enable sounds and score in the settings section. If you enable the score, you’ll increase the difficulty of the game: in fact, if your score reaches zero, it is a game over and the level restarts. You can check or clear your record scores for each level in the settings section. ============================= If you like this app, please contribute with donations to the developer efforts by purchasing the full version. === FULL VERSION FEATURES === In the Full version you'll get 60 levels and a more difficult hard stage due to the apples, that come back to life. Enjoy!

description: Be my Valentine Lite is the Live Wallpaper that will give a colorful and romantic touch to your smartphone. It is a special gift for the sweethearts of every age. If you will pop the hearts moving on the background, then famous love quotes will appear framed in an ancient styled parchment. Quotes: 30 for the free version, more than 100 in the Full Version. You can change the Hearts Type that wander around your screen: Bubbles and Shiny Types are available for the free-Lite version; Diamonds, Solid and Broken are added to the Full Version. You can change also the dimension and the speed of the hearts (both in the Lite and in the Full Version) You can also select one of the five available backgrounds: - Abstract - Venice at Dawn - Venice by Day (Full Version only) - Venice Sunset (Full Version only) - Venice by Night (Full Version only) Venice (Venezia) in Italy is par excellence the most famous city for lovers and sweethearts in the world. If you enable the localization (Full Version only) the Venice background will change automatically during the day. In the Full Version you can also add your picture from the phone gallery as a background with three setting options: - Stretch to fit the screen - Preserve the size with dark strips - Crop the image to fill the screen Finally, you can also disable the quotes (if you don't like it), change their speed (only Full Version) or the way they disappear away from the screen (only Full Version): automatically or on-touch ( the on-touch mode enables you to keep persistent on the screen a quote you like very much ). Enjoy Be my Valentine! If you like this free Live Wallpaper, please buy the full version: Be My Valentine Live Wallpaper. The permission FULL INTERNET ACCESS and VIEW NETWORK STATE are only for the ads present in the Settings. This is my second Live Wallpaper that uses advertising. Please don't be sad about ads, they will appear only in the Settings and not on your live wallpaper screen. When you use the live wallpaper as live background on your phone, it doesn't access to internet. NO AIRPUSH. If you don’t want ads in the setting, please consider to help the developer efforts buying the full paid version with NO ADS.

description: Math Adventure! is fun and Math vs. Dora Run Math Workout, one of the best games can prove it! It combines run games and educational games for kids in one fun game free. Think math is boring or difficult? Then play the running game that improves your math skills! Aligned with the Common Core State Standards for Kindergarten through Grade 4, this app provides training at various levels in addition, subtraction, multiplication and division. Great for children or adults who want to practice arithmetic skills while playing a fun reflex-based game! Kids love Dora games especially if they are run games, and parents love educational games for kids, so we’ve made this Math vs. Dora run Math Workout application to satisfy both kids and parents. Learning was never easier! Primarily this is an educational game for teens and can be seen as math for 3th to 5th graders and even can be useful as exercise for older kids. It is suitable for little kids as well, as it is also one of the games for preschool kids that can help kids later on in school. Here, kids deal with elementary math in a funny and interesting way. We know math can cause a lot of problems to both kids and parents, but this cool math game can have multiple benefits. One the other hand, scientists say that brain needs training like muscles do, so parents set your mind into action with this game for adults and fun mind game. Everybody can enjoy this family game and both girls and boys will have fun while learning. Kids, don’t run away from math problems, because they are not as hard as they seem! All you have to do is to grow the plants of your knowledge for Dora Run Math by solving math problems and enjoying fun games for teens at the same time! * If you share this Game with your family and friend, I believe you will give them a surprise Privacy Disclosure: As parents ourselves, privacy very seriously. Our app: • Does not contain links to social networks • Does not contain any in-app purchases • Does not collect personal data But yes, it does contain advertising as that’s our means of providing the app free of cost to you – the ads are carefully placed such that the kid is least likely to click on it while playing.

Roll the dice and contemplate your next move. Simple Dice is a game of strategy and chance. Whether you choose to save your roll and earn the allotted points for a three of a kind, or keep trying for a 40 -point large straight, this Yahtzee style game will have you crossing your fingers for that lucky roll. Score Categories The simple interface makes it easy to see how many points each score category will offer your roll by displaying potential points next to each one, but it won't make the decision for you. What you choose to do with each roll is up to you. There are thirteen score categories displayed on the screen above your roll. You get three chances to roll and save rolls for that desired score before you must choose a score category. Each category can only be used once. Two Modes of Play Your grandma may have taught you the traditional way to play, but Simple Dice likes to shake things up. Simple Dice has two modes of play: Classic (like the way your grandma taught you) and Freedom (like your first night out without a curfew). In Classic Mode, once a roll is assigned to a score category, it cannot be moved. But in Freedom Mode you are free to roam! Rolls can be moved from one category to another in case you encounter bigger and better rolls. And for the "Oops, I can't believe I just did that" move, both modes have an Undo Last Move option. Save High Scores From novice to pro it is always nice to remember where you came from. Simple Dice allows you to save your score after each game. As your strategy improves, watch your points grow. Features: - realistic dice sounds - move rolls between score categories using Freedom mode - set custom colors and save high scores The free version of this game displays advertisements. For an ad-free version please purchase Simple Slots also available in the Marketplace. Thanks for playing!

description: Snake 3D is the first application by Execute on Google Play. It is an adaptation for Android of a small game originally developed with OpenGL on Windows. This is the classic snake game revisited in 3D. The snake eats thre frog (green cube) and grow. He dies if it touches a wall or his own body. To turn right slide your finger to the right to turn left, slide your finger to the left. You can also change the view by dragging up or down. Application tested on Galaxy Tab 2 and SONY Tipo ... it should work on most tablets. You can pause the game with 2 fingers, in this mode you can also turn aroud the snake

Applicazione Android del torneo di calcetto più importante di Roma. Nato nel 2007 dall'idea e dalla passione per il calcio a 5 dell'organizzatore Raffaele, il Torneo Mikonos Cup è un nome di riferimento per chi, nella Capitale, ama il calcio a 5 in tutte le sue manifestazioni. Il torneo è arrivato alla decima edizione. Diversi i nomi di spicco che hanno calcato i campi della manifestazione: da Sergio Romano, Apicerni, Delgado e tanti altri che hanno dato ulteriore lustro alla rassegna, che vive però in continua evoluzione,rinnovandosi di anno in anno, sulla spinta di quel cambiamento che contribuisce a renderlo sempre più esaltante. (video sito applicazione mobile ecc... ). Tutto è pronto per scrivere una nuova pagina della storia della Mikonos Cup, tra vecchi protagonisti e volti nuovi, che lotteranno per la vittoria finale di questo torneo dove non manca l'agonismo e la giusta competizione, ma dove il rispetto dei valori, l'amicizia e l'aggregazione sono il denominatore comune di tutti quelli che hanno voglia di divertirsi e di mettersi in gioco nel tentativo di lasciare un'indelebile traccia di sé. CONTATTI: - Raffaele Telefono: 3406946122 Mail: mikonoscup@yahoo.it Sito Web: http://goo.gl/r2RL7M Facebook: http://goo.gl/4MSXSz CHANGELOG: versione 1.0.0 - prima versione stabile - sezioni monitorate: News, Editoriale, Classifiche, Calendario, Video, Miglior Giocatore, Top 5 e Giudice Sportivo. versione 1.1.0 - aggiunta l'opzione "Condividi la app" versione 1.2.0 - bug fix dei caratteri nell'articolo - modificata la sezione "Info" - aggiunto lo zoom negli articoli versione 1.3.0 - modificata la sezione "Video" versione 1.4.0 - aggiunto splash screen Applicazione creata da: Raphael Bussa Twitter: @rebus_007 Sito Web: www.rebus007.tk Android application of the most important football tournament in Rome. Born in 2007, the idea and the passion for football in 5 organizer Raphael, the Tournament Cup Mikonos is a name of reference for those who, in the capital, loves football to 5 in all its manifestations. The tournament has reached the tenth edition. Several prominent names who have trod the fields of the event: by Sergio Romano, Apicerni, Delgado and many others who have given luster to further review, however, who lives in constant evolution, renewing every year, in the wake of the change that helps to make it more exciting. (Video site mobile application etc ...). Everything is ready to write a new page in the history of Mykonos Cup, between old players and new faces, who will fight for the final victory of this tournament where there is lack of competition and fair competition, but where respect for the values, l ' friendship and aggregation are the common denominator of all those who want to have fun and to get involved in an attempt to leave an indelible trace. Mister Gadget è l'alter ego di Luca Viscardi: si occupa di tecnologia, ma non è molto interessato alle caratteristiche tecniche dei prodotti. Vaga alla ricerca dell'anima che è nascosta dentro di loro. Mister Gadget è un programma di Radio Number One, in onda ogni sera alle 20; è un canale youtube, un mondo di comunicazione social, una rubrica mensile su Maxim. Mister Gadget è uno spazio on line dedicato a chi non smette mai di scoprire, come te. This beautifully crafted widget keeps Martian time at the MSL Curiosity landing site. Accuracy largely depends on the accuracy of your phone's system time. Supported Martian time definitions include Local Mean Solar Time, LMST, Local True Solar Time, LTST and Local Mean Zonal Time, LMZT. Tap on labels to view definitions. The widget centers on the location of Curiosity, not on the center of the Gale crater. Any friendly suggestions are welcome and invited. Select between LMST, LTST, LMZT Time on Mars (mission time) clock hh:mm or hh:mm:ss format toggle Sunrise & set at site Daylight duration at site Sun altitude at site Earth rise & set at site Earth altitude at site Sidereal time at site Light time to Earth Temperature at site Air pressure at site Mars ephemerides Mars/Earth AMT/UTC time Bundled manual in PDF Users' manual (PDF) An online demo is available at http://marscuriosity.requio.com/ " target="_blank"> http://marscuriosity.requio.com/ ご購入をお考えのお客様へ、 本アプリーに関するご質問は日本語でもお受けしております。 お気軽にお問い合わせください。 BEFORE YOU PURCHASE: Purchase only if you know how to install widgets after download. Please appreciate that the author cannot purchase all hardware and provider contracts for the large number of Android devices currently on the market. Please be so kind as to send a report preferably with screen snap should you encounter any layout issues. This application requires Android 2.2 or higher and a display which is to the Android standard. Please contact the author, if you have any pre-sales questions.
release_text: Ver 1.09: rise and set time errors fixed Ver 1.08: updated air pressure data Ver 1.07: fixes FC at 00:00 LTST Ver 1.06: adds ground temperature Ver 1.05: adds air pressure, temperature accuracy improved Ver 1.04: adds Earth rise & set times, adds PDF users' manual Ver 1.03: adds hh:mm/hh:mm:ss format choice for the main time display, info box added. Ver 1.02: adds expected near-surface atmospheric temperature at the Gale Crater landing site. Ver 1.01: corrects Sol day counter for LMZT.

description: Sky Atlas is not planetarium or simulation software. It is designed analog to a paper atlas for the purpose of looking up sky positions of celestial objects. The electronic form takes advantage of zooming and selection of objects to be displayed or not -- possibilities which are not available to paper. The star chart is plotted on equatorial coordinates. Current horizontal positions, rise & set times, etc. for objects can be viewed after selection of an object of interest. A star chart can be saved to external memory card for documentation purposes, such as websites or blogs. The use of Sky Atlas is believed to be simple, intuitive and largely self-explanatory, yet requiring basic knowledge of astronomy and familiarity with your Android phone. Atlas Objects Opens a list of object categories. Tap on a category to view available objects. Upon selection of an object, its data is shown in a message box, from which to return to selection of another object or choose to center an object on the star chart. Categories which contain a large number of objects are assigned a sub-menu (tap on screen's menu button) which allow to narrow down by various criteria dependent on the nature of the category. * Constellations * Named Stars * Nearby Stars * Binary Stars * Variable Stars * Exoplanets * All Messier objects with images * Bright deepsky objects with images * All Caldwell objects with images * Solar System Planets * Dwarf Planets & Asteroids * Comets * Meteor Showers * Hubble Objects * Kepler Field Overlay * Celestial Poles References This list of items is not directly related to the star chart, but to astronomical time-keeping, information and visualizations. * Rise, set, twilight times * Day & Night Visualization * Planisphere * Rectangular view of the sun's vicinity * Earth Globe in 3D * Moon Atlas in 3D * Moon Calendar * MSL Curiosity Station * 3D planetary phase views * Planetary Moons * Spacecrafts * Pleiades Close-up * Solar Eclipses * Greek Alphabet * Glossary * Historical Timeline * Zodiacal Signs * Martian Moons * Plutonian Moons Computing This section is for astronomical computing, such as current positions of the Galilean moons, orbit simulation, calculation of optical equipment performance and more. * Galilean Moons * Orbit Simulator * Distances among Stars * Speed of Light Simulation * Telescope Calculator * Binocular Calculator * CCD Imaging Calculator * Optical Formulae * JD-Date/Date-JD Converter Star Chart * Stars down to magnitude 6.4 * Constellation lines * Constellation boundaries * All Messier objects * Bright NGC/IC objects * All Caldwell objects * Sun, moon and planets overlay * Equatorial Grid * Equator line * Ecliptic line * Associated object labels * Color display * Monochrome, negative display * Nightview (red display) Sky Atlas is designed only for Android phones operating in portrait mode. If you own a tablet please search for "Sky Atlas Tablet". Galaxy Precident SCH-M828C and similarly small phones not supported. ご購入をお考えのお客様へ、 本アプリーに関するご質問は日本語でもお受けしております。 お気軽にお問い合わせください。

description: Saturnian is software to help plan and assist observations of the major saturnian satellites. Saturnian plots current and time-shifted positions of the moons, both as on-north orbit view and edge-on, while the latter can be tilted to Saturns's rotation axis (geocentric) or parallactic angle (topcentric), if Saturn is above horizon. Transiting moons and their shadows are plotted on an enlarged view of the planet. Saturnian also computes detailed physical and positional ephemerides for Saturn and its major moons. Furthermore, a chart is provided showing Saturn's elongation from the Sun. ESSENTIAL FEATURES * Orbit and edge-on views * Tilted edge-on views * Views through various optics * Time shift ±10 min, ±1 hour, ±1 day * Selectable date and time * Rise, set transit times * Saturn Ephemerides * Saturn moons ephemerides * Rectangular coordinates * GPS-enabled or manual input * No internet connection required * Runs in full-screen portrait mode * Simple operation ご購入をお考えのお客様へ、 本アプリーに関するご質問は日本語でもお受けしております。 お気軽にお問い合わせください。 BEFORE YOU PURCHASE: 1. This application is designed for phones and tablet in portrait mode. 2. Please be so kind as to send a report preferably with screen snap should you encounter any layout issues. 3. This application requires Android 2.1 or higher. 4. Please contact the author, if you have any pre-sales questions.

description: This application is probably best suited for children with parential attendance. Using the device sensors "Fun with Planets" finds the Sun, Moon and planets of our solar system by moving the device along the sky. For this work for you, your device must incorporate an orientation sensor. In its early weeks, the application is rolled out for free, but will be further developed for more stability, higher accuracy and further details, as it transits to a paid product. "Fun with Planets" informs equatorial, horizontal, ecliptical and galactic coordinates of any position in the sky and centered solar system objects as well as local time and sidereal time on a single screen which also includes a compass. Object data, such as current sky position and ephemerides are provided upon tapping on an object image. "Fun with Planets" employs the device camera which can be toggled on and off. Most device cameras, however, are not sensitive enough to capture the planets in its preview screen. "Fun with Planets" attempts to increase the ISO value to a maximum. Unfortunately, not all devices support this function. If you prefer to use this application with engaged camera, make sure that the device battery is charged. "Fun with Planets" is believed to run on both phones and tablets, however, not all devices are designed to the Android standard. Before you rate emotionally in a haste, please send the author an email in case of issues. Comments posted in Google Play cannot be replied. As seen from the vantage of Earth, solar system objects are moving along an apparent path in the sky which is called "the ecliptic", which is the exact path of the sun over a year, specifically, the plane of the orbit of Earth around the sun. The orbits of the moon and the planets are slightly inclined to the ecliptic in that they do not move on, but very close to the ecliptic. In due course of Earth's orbit, the sun apparently moves through 13 constellations, from Pisces to Aquarius, that are crossed by the ecliptic. Since Earth's equator is tilted 23.4 degrees against the ecliptic, the ecliptic draws a sine-shaped curve around the equator of Earth projected on the sky. Keywords: astronomy, solar system, planets, moon

'Voyagers' is a 4 x 2 sized home screen widget for the purpose of monitoring the current distances of NASA's space probes Voyager I and Voyager II. Parameters which accommodate Earth's orbit can be updated online. Essential Features * Distance to Earth in km and AU * Distance to Sun in km and AU * Light time to Earth and Sun * 12 different background images * Background change manually or automatically * Plays interstellar sound file * Details about Voyager 1's heading * Tested on phones and tablets This application is believed to be reliable and accurate, however, errors inherent to the human factor or operating system implementation cannot be ruled out entirely. BEFORE YOU PURCHASE: 1. Please make most efficient use of Google Play's narrow refund window. 2. Please contact the author by email , if you have any pre-sales questions. Яндекс.Навигатор будет показываться автоматически после звонка. При звонке телефон переключается на приложение телефон, и поэтому очень часто приходится обратно вызывать навигатор после завершения звонка. Данное приложение делает это автоматически. Приложение отслеживает, был ли активен Навигатор при звонке, и после него автоматически возвращается в него, делая вашу поездку более комфортной и безопасной! Будем рады отзывам на restart@rphone.ru Yandeks.Navigator will be displayed automatically after the call. When you call the phone switches to the phone app, and therefore often have to call back the navigator after the call. This application does this automatically. The application keeps track of whether the Navigator is active when you call, and after it automatically returns to it, making your trip more comfortable and safe! We will be happy to vote for restart@rphone.ru

description: Pescuit Crap este un ghid Aventuri la pescuit, brandul media numarul 1 in pescuitul sportiv din Romania, ce contine detalii despre monturi, momeli, nade, fire, noduri, tehnici, sfaturi si multe secrete. Prima aplicatie romaneasca si totdodata cea mai cuprinzatoare aplicatie din lume dedicata exclusiv pescuitului la crap. Aplicatia acopera toate aspectele importante ale pescuitului la crap: realizarea si folosirea monturilor, noduri, alegerea carligelor si a montajelor de plumb, momeli si nade, lansete, mulinete, fire principale sau pentru forfac, agrafe si anouri, suporti si avertizori, componenta trusei, corturi si paturi, saltele de receptie, tehnici de nadire, tehnici de pescuit, sfaturi si secrete etc Singura aplicatie din lume care prezinta toata informatia esentiala practicarii pescuitului la crap. Avand aceasta aplicatie in mana orice novice isi poate constitui singur trusa, poate lega carligele si realiza monturile, poate alege singur nada si momeala. Pescarii mai avansati isi vor extinde arsenalul de cunostinte pentru a putea aborda mai eficace situatiile din teren. Specialistii in pescuitul la crap au scris-o. Monturi : Numarul mare de monturi pentru pescuitul crapului promovat de revistele de specialitate a fost redus de specilistii nostri la 10 monturi esentiale care acopera practic toate situatiile de pescuit: montura simpla fir de par, montura snowman fir combi, montura combi, montura blow-back, montura sir/inel de viermusi, montura D, montura 360, montura Zig, montura Chod și montura KD. Noduri: Principalele 9 tipuri de noduri folosite in pescuiul la crap: nodul fara nod, nodul clinch imbunatatit, nodul Albright etc. Nade si momeli : Toate tipurile principale de nade si momeli de la pelete si boiliesuri la seminte si larve de chironomide aplicabilitatea lor si principalii producatori. Carlige : Prezentarea principalelor tipuri de carlige pentru crap : curve shank, long shank, wide gape, choddy si curve long shank avand caracteristicile, aplicabilitatea si principalii producatori. Fire : Firele de forfac, fire camasa, fire textile suple, monofilamentul, fluorocarbonul, leadcore-ul, firele de inaintas sunt descrise avantajele si dezavantajele fiecaruia, unde este indicata folosirea lor, producatorii principali si preturile lor. Plumbi : Plumbii Grippa, plumbii de distanta vartej, plumbii de distanta in-line etc sint prezentati avand caracteristicile, avantajele, dezavantajele si aplicabilitatea lor. Lanseta : Tipurile de lansete folosite in pescuitul la crap, actiunea, puterea si lungimea, utilizarea lor, principalii producatori si preturile sint prezentate in aceasta sectiune. Mulineta : Principalele componente ale mulinetei de crap, ilustrate avand detalii fotografice si o sectiune despre caracteristicile mulinetei, preturi si producatori. Accesorii monturi : De la agrafe si anouri, clipsuri, crosete si opritoare de momeala, materiale solubile (PVA) si pasta de plumb pina la penar si foarfeca, va prezentam toate accesoriile folosite in realizarea si pastrarea monturilor. Corturi, paturi si saci de dormit : Ce trebuie sa stim cand le cumparam, care sunt principalii producatori si intervalul de preturi. Tehnici de pescuit si de nadire : O sectiune foarte utila pe balta si in etapa de pregatire a partidei de pescuit. Sfaturi si secrete : A fost nevoie de multe insistente (si amenintari :)) pentru a scoate de la specialistii nostri sfaturile cele mai folositoare pescarilor obisnuiti. Urmati-le si veti avea succes! Aplicatia este un produs romanesc lansat si international sub marca Clear Fishing in limbile germana si engleza. Despre Aventuri la pescuit, brandul media numarul 1 in pescuitul sportiv din Romania, puteti afla mai multe vizitind www.aventurilapescuit.ro Carp fishing is a fishing guide Adventures, No. 1 media brand in sport fishing in Romania, which contains details on frames, bait, bait, yarn, knots, techniques, secret tips and more. In the same period the first application Romanian and most comprehensive application in the world dedicated exclusively to carp fishing. The application covers all important aspects of carp fishing: making and using mounts, knots, choosing hooks and lead assemblies, lures and baits, rods, reels, or forfac main thread, pins and Panels, and support whistleblowers, component kit, tents and blankets, mattresses reception nadir techniques, fishing techniques, tips and tricks, etc. The only app in the world that shows all the essential information carp fishing practice. With this app in hand any novice they can be single kit can attach hooks and make mounts may choose one lure and bait. More advanced fishermen expand their arsenal of knowledge to more effectively address situations in the field. Carp fishing specialists have written. Frames: Large number of frames for carp fishing magazines promoted was reduced to 10 frames our specilistii essential that covers virtually all fishing situations: simple mount hair, wire snowman combi mount, combi mount, mount blow-back mount Sir / viermusi ring, mount D mount 360, Zig rig, Chod rig and mount KD. Carp Fishing Italiano e la piu ampia guida di carp fishing attualmente disponibile nei maggiori app stores. Questo app tratta tutti gli aspetti importanti del carp fishing: la costruzione e l’applicabilita delle montature, i nodi, le strutture dell’amo, i sistemi di applicazione del piombo, le esche e gli inneschi, le canne e i mulinelli, i fili da pesca, gli accessori, i rod pods e i segnalatori d’abboccata, le tende e i lettini, i materassini e le sacche, la pasturazione e le tecniche di pesca, trucchi e suggerimenti etc. Carp Fishing Italiano si propone di fornire tutte le informazioni necessarie per catturare con pieno successo la carpa importante. Guidato da questo app, un principiante assoluto sara in grado di allestire una cassetta per l’attrezzatura, scegliere e legare ami affidabili, costruire montature, scegliere un’esca e un innesco ispirati e mirare alla carpa importante. I pescatori intermedi acquisiranno nuove conoscenze che consentiranno loro di approcciarsi piu efficacemente alle varie situazioni sul campo. Carp Fishing e stato sviluppato da esperti carpisti europei, giornalisti e programmatori. Montature: Il gran numero di montature presentate dalle riviste di carp fishing e stato ridotto dai nostri specialisti a 10 lenze essenziali che praticamente coprono tutte le situazioni del carp fishing: la montatura a capello basica (semplice), quella a omino di neve, quella combi, quella blowback, il maggot rig (la montatura da bigattini), il D rig, quella a 360 gradi, il chod rig, lo zig rig e il KD rig. Istruzioni chiare e foto mostrano come costruire correttamente ciascuna montatura e spiegano come usarla. Successivi aggiornamenti aggiungeranno montature derivate o altamente specializzate. Sistemi per il piombo: Questa sezione insegna come scegliere e costruire il sistema appropriato di applicazione del piombo, sia il sistema con clip per il piombo (conosciuto anche come sistema con piombo semi-fisso, o sistema con clip di sicurezza), il sistema a elicottero (chod) o quello con piombo in linea. Ci sono molti sistemi di applicazione del piombo promossi sul mercato, ma la maggior parte di essi sono variazioni di quelli citati sopra. Aggiornamenti descriveranno anche queste varianti. Nodi: I 9 principali tipi di nodi usati nel carp fishing: il nodo senza nodo, l’improved clinch, l’albright, il grinner, il palomar, il trilene, l’uni, il dropper e il nodo di sangue. Esche e inneschi: Tutti i principali tipi di esche e inneschi, dai pellets e le boilies alle particles (semi) e i vermi di sangue, sono descritti con i dettagli di applicabilita e le principali marche. Strutture dell’amo: Vengono descritte le seguenti strutture dell’amo, le loro corrispondenti caratteristiche, l’applicabilita e le marche principali: a gambo curvo, a gambo lungo, a curva larga, choddy e a gambo lungo e curvo. Fili da pesca: Punti di forza e debolezze, applicabilita, marche principali e range di prezzo per: madrelenze, fili da montatura, fili trecciati rivestiti, trecciati morbidi, monofili, fluorocarbons, leadcores, shock leaders e altri. Canne: Tipi di canne usate nel carp fishing, loro principali caratteristiche (azione, potenza e lunghezza) spiegate, e consigli su marche, range di prezzo e quale tipo di canna si dovrebbe scegliere. Mulinelli: Le componenti del mulinello (punti importanti con primi piani nelle foto), le caratteristiche, le marche e il range di prezzo. Pasturazione e tecniche di pesca: Questa e una sezione utile per preparare una sessione di pesca alla carpa o per cercare nuove idee mentre si pesca. Trucchi e consigli: Un alto grado di persuasione e stato impiegato per strappare questi consigli dai nostri specialisti. Seguiteli per avere successo! description: Metric Converter is an app meant to facilitate the conversion between measurement units including temperature, distance, volume and weight. This handy and intuitive app will help you convert metric or imperial units easily, making it very useful in daily activities like cooking recipe conversion, fuel estimation or distance measurement. Just insert the value you want to convert into the corresponding field, select the desired measurement. Your answer will appear immediately. Metric Converter’s features include: Temperature Distances Weight Volumes Surface Pressure Speed Time Digital-Data Fuel-Consumption Please comment and rate Metric Converter to help us improve this app.

Notice Application officially supports only HTC EVO 3D GSM/CDMA, however it might also work on other devices If you install this application on unsupported device and something isn't working don't give bad mark. Send me mail and i will see what i can do Submit issues here: https://github.com/pedja1/Kernel-Tuner/issues/new Info for HTC One XL, HTC One S, HTC Evo 4G LTE There is a problem on some devices that is causing CPU1 settings not to stick. This is a Kernel/ROM issue, not the app Description Kernel Tuner is tool for root users to completely customize their device behavior. This is the only application that offers full multi-core control over their devices. It allows users to control each core of their devices independently. Custom kernel is required. Most of the features will only work on custom kernels. Check with your kernel developer to see if feature is supported List of Features: *Multi-Core CPU Handling – Control each CPU Core of your device independently *GPU Overclocking – Only Qualcomm Snapdragon S3 and S4 devices with appropriate kernel are supported *Voltage controll for the CPU *View Times CPU was in *Profiles *Plugin for Tasker/Llama/Locale for changing profile *Governor Settings *mpdecision *thermald *Changing Capacitive Buttons Backlight *Fastcharge *Vsync *Notification LED Timeout *Sweep2Wake *Swap Permissions [*]Storage(modify/delete SD card content) - used for writing application logs to SD card [*]Your personal information(read sensitive log data) - read system logs for debugging purposes [*]Network communications(full internet access, view network state) - Used for ads [*]System tools(automatically start at boot) - Used to restore application configuration and settings after reboot [*][*]System tools(install shortcuts) - Used for installing Home Screen shortcuts If you have any problem or suggestion feel free to contact me, or write on official thread on XDA Developers http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=1719934 Follow me: Google Plus: https://plus.google.com/u/0/b/115273553144904124119/ Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/KernelTuner Twitter: https://twitter.com/kerneltuner There is no need to give bad marks and report FCs in review. I am aware of every crash that happens and im doing my best to fix it as soon as i can. Thanks
release_text: New Kernel Tuner Beta Available Check it out here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=rs.pedjaapps.kerneltuner You can find latest news about my projects here www.pedjaapps.net

description: «Я беременна» – личный консультант по ведению беременности. Программа расскажет вам о том, как развивается малыш, какие изменения происходят с мамой на каждой неделе, чего ждать во время беременности и чего следует опасаться. «Я беременна» подскажет, когда и какие анализы нужно сдавать, что взять в роддом и ответит на другие ваши вопросы. В программе: – Основной раздел Каждая неделя беременности подробно расписана. Мамочка может каждую неделю узнавать интересную и нужную информацию о том, как развивается малыш, что происходит с ее телом, чего ждать и чего стоит опасаться в этот период беременности. А еще на главном экране можно смотреть, как развивается малыш внутри – с каждой неделей он растет и меняется. Помимо этого, вы узнаете о том, какие органы ребеночка уже сформированы и работают в настоящий момент, а какие только формируются. – Раздел «Списки» В программе есть подробные списки того, что нужно взять в роддом. Теперь вы ничего не забудете! – Раздел «Видео» Можно посмотреть видео и узнать о том, как правильно питаться во время беременности, дышать при родах, какие физические упражнения делать и др. – Экспорт ежедневника в PDF Удобный ежедневник для заметок и фотографий можно легко экспортировать в PDF и сохранять на своем компьютере. – Графики веса и сдачи анализов Мамочка может следить за своим весом и весом малыша, а еще заранее узнавать, когда и какие анализы нужно будет сдать. – Красивый виджет Если его разместить на экране, он будет автоматически подсчитывать дни до рождения малыша. P.S. Если на виджете не вмещаются все данные, то просто измените размер виджета так, как вам нравится "I'm pregnant" - a personal consultant to expectant mothers. The program will tell you how the baby develops, what changes occur with my mother every week, what to expect during pregnancy and to be feared. "I'm pregnant" tells you when and what tests need to take, what to take to the hospital and to answer your other questions. The program includes: - The main section Each week of pregnancy detail painted. Mom can every week to learn interesting and useful information on how to develop the baby, what's going on with her body what to expect and what is to be feared in this period of pregnancy. And on the main screen, you can watch as the baby develops inside - every week he grows and changes. In addition, you will learn about what the baby bodies have been formed and are working at the moment, and which only formed. - Section "Lists" The program has a detailed list of what you need to take to the hospital. Now you do not forget! - "Video" You can watch the video and learn how to eat right during pregnancy, childbirth breathing, what exercise to do, and others. - Export to PDF diary Convenient for daily notes and photos can be easily exported to PDF and save on your computer. - Charts of weight and delivery of analyzes Mom can keep track of your weight and the weight of the baby, and even in advance to find out when and what tests need to pass. - Beautiful widget If it is placed on the screen, it will automatically count the days until the birth of the baby. P.S. If the widget does not fit all the data, then simply change the size of the widget as you like
release_text: Версия 5.2 Исправлена ошибка при загрузке на некоторых устройствах Версия 5.1 - Добавлена заставка - Добавлена возможность отключить видео на закладке "Сегодня" Версия 5.0 - Полностью изменился интерфейс программы. - Появился основной раздел, в котором беременность подробно расписана по неделям. - Можно наблюдать за тем, как растет малыш внутри мамочки. - Добавлены списки того, что нужно взять с собой в роддом.

Well, if you have long studied the language, you will never be more than repeat what has been passed, because human memory is short-lived. People exchange information by means of words, i.e. verbally, and by body movements, such as looks, mimics, gestures, and poses, i.e. via non-verbal signals. Researchers proved that the bulk of information we obtain is from non-verbal sources, and only a small amount comes from the words of the interlocutor. However, many just don't know what certain gestures mean and therefore non-verbal information remains closed for them. But now everyone has a chance to learn to read other people's thoughts! You can: - learn whether the interlocutor is telling you a lie; - learn to deal better with representatives of the opposite gender; - determine motives of the man's behavior; - find out his current emotional condition; - check your better half's faithfulness; - create your own positive image and … skillfully deceive others. This attachment will teach you to read the language of gestures, mimics, poses and much more. All these methods are effectively used at interrogations of special services and the FBI, in monitoring people and in many other cases. Now you have a chance of lifting the curtain of secrecy and learning the mysteries hidden behind it! Download this attachment and learn to read other people's thoughts.

Программа для расчета содержания алкоголя в крови и оценки Вашего состояния в зависимости от количества выпитого алкоголя, его крепости и времени, прошедшего после его употребления. Добавлена возможность "обратного расчета", рассчитывает рекомендуемое к употреблению количество алкоголя в зависимости от крепости напитка и времени, необходимого для полного выведения алкоголя из крови, т.е. зная через сколько часов необходимо сесть за руль и ассортимент напитков, можно вычислить максимальную дозу. A program for calculating blood alcohol content and assessment of your condition depending on the amount of alcohol consumed, its fortress and the time elapsed after its use. Added possibility "reverse calculation", calculates recommended to use the amount of alcohol, depending on the beverage strength and the time required for complete removal of alcohol from the blood, i.e. knowing how many hours you must get behind the wheel and an assortment of drinks, you can calculate the maximum dose.

Каждого человека на протяжении жизни окружает огромное количество цифр, начиная с чисел в свидетельстве о его рождении. Но большинство из нас даже не подозревает, что они могут влиять на жизненный путь и представляют собой ценный источник информации. Использовать нумерологию в повседневной жизни может каждый человек, даже весьма далекий от математики. Достаточно, следуя указаниям, сделать простейшие вычисления — и вы получаете ключ к лучшему пониманию себя и происходящего в вашей жизни. Зная число своего жизненного пути , вы будете знать свои сильные и слабые стороны, какая профессия вам наиболее подходит, в каких областях вам будет способствовать успех и многое другое. Подсчитав число жизненного пути другого человека, вы лучше узнаете его, сможете гораздо быстрее найти к нему подход. Главное вы научитесь лучше понимать и разбираться в себе и других людях! Успехов!

Unique, first in Russia FIELD mobile guide to birds of Northern Eurasia: 206 most prevalent species, each with photo and drawing of male and female (if different), nest and egg, typical identification features and text descriptions and voices, that you can set as a ringtone for a call directly from the application! It is easy and fun to identify species using 13 determination morphological characters with 3-8 values in each of them. Application consists from 6 main parts: Guide, Atlas, Textbook, Manual, Systematic Tree (with class, family and genus descriptions) and Quiz. The application works without Internet connection, you can use it directly in nature if you see or hear the unknown bird or find unknown nest or egg shell. Using the Guide you can narrow the number of possible species to 2-3 and then compare your object with their images and descriptions in the Atlas.
release_text: - First Android version - 04.04.2013 - First PC-Windows version - 14.09.2006

description: Advanced technologies for advanced children! Let your child play with special augmented toy blocks - "AR Animals". A kid plays with blocks. Nothing special. He composes a picture, takes his tablet or smartphone, directs camera to the picture and… WOW! – The picture becomes alive! A funny doggie chases its own tail, a kitten tries to catch a butterfly and a brown bear eats honey from the barrel. You can find the first sets of living blocks ("Animals", “Cars" and " Fairy tales") in the most toy shops in Russia and CIS! HOW TO PLAY: 1. Buy a set of blocks “AR Animals” produced by the company "Stellar". 2. Download and run this application on your mobile device. WARNING: you must turn on the camera. 3. Make a picture and point the camera to it If the picture is assembled incorrectly, wrong cubes are highlighted red. If everything is right, you see the green highlighting. Now you can play! Listen to prompts and click on the various parts of the animal to learn its secrets. The developer’s website - www.живыекубики.рф The basic version contains six amusing 3d models: a doggie, a kitten, a mouse, a zebra, polar and brown bears. System requirements: Android version from 4.0. Camera: built-in, min. resolution 320x240. Processor: dual-core, CPU clock from 1,2 gigahertz.

Advanced technologies for advanced children! Let your child play with special augmented toy blocks - "AR Fairy Tales". A kid plays with blocks. Nothing special. He composes a picture, takes his tablet or smartphone, directs camera to the picture and… WOW! – The picture becomes alive! A hut on the chicken legs dances, Mowgli laughs and waves his hands and Father Frost congratulates everyone. You can find the first sets of living blocks ("Fairy tales", "Animals" and “Cars") in the most toy shops in Russia and CIS! HOW TO PLAY: 1. Buy a set of blocks “AR Fairy Tales” produced by the company "Stellar". 2. Download and run this application on your mobile device. WARNING: you must turn on the camera. 3. Make a picture and point the camera to it If the picture is assembled incorrectly, wrong cubes are highlighted red. If everything is right, you see the green highlighting. Now you can play! Listen to prompts and click on the various parts of the character to learn its secrets. The developer’s website - www.живыекубики.рф The basic version contains six interesting 3d heroes: A hut on the chicken legs, Mowgli, Father Frost, A Golden Fish, Speckled Hen and Kolobok. System requirements: Android version from 4.0. Camera: built-in, min. resolution 320x240. Processor: dual-core, CPU clock from 1,2 gigahertz.

description: Become one of the air aces of the WWI. Help allies to end a brutal and never-ending war. Join us! Prove you're the best of the air aces! Be ready to : • Immerse yourself in a stylish gaming world • Complete many exciting missions • Fly different combat aircrafts • Put your skills to a test with numerous achievements • Spend a lot of battles with the aces of the world • Immortalize your results in the game world Tags : airplane, biplane, triplane, flight, simulator, combat, battle, history, world war, bomb, multiplayer

Become one of the air aces of the WWI. Help allies to end a brutal and never-ending war. Join us! Prove you're the best of the air aces! Be ready to : • Immerse yourself in a stylish gaming world • Complete many exciting missions • Fly different combat aircrafts • Put your skills to a test with numerous achievements • Spend a lot of battles with the aces of the world • Immortalize your results in the game world Tags : airplane, biplane, triplane, flight, simulator, combat, battle, history, world war, bomb, multiplayer, free, game

Press on into WWII in a bigger, brighter and more action packed adventure! Continue to live the glory as one of the daring air aces battling your way through WWII in full color HD graphics and intuitive touch controls. Help the allied (or Axis) powers to end the war fighting against tanks, troops, aircraft, cannons as well as many more obstacles between you and victory. Complete exciting offensive, defences and support mission flying a handful of classic proven upgradable aircraft though three exciting landscapes. Prove you're the best of the air aces once again! Features : • Basic Tutorial. • Challenging AI. • Simple 3D graphics. • Simple large touch controls. • Choose Allied or Axis Powers. • Many Ranks to progress though. • Three different battle landscapes. • NO ADS OR IN-APP PURCHASES EVER! • Many different UPGRADABLE classic combat aircraft to fly. • Multiple mission types (Scouting, Capture the Flag, Destroy the Base, etc). FAQ: You may tap on the desired mission button on the world map to get the action started. When you start each mission, you may select your aircraft and extra module. You can choose between extra ammo, extra fuel or extra bombs. You have 4 stats to monitor: armor, fuel and bullets and bombs. There are two methods to replenish these stats. You may land anywhere on the map and wait for a refuelling track to refuel and reload more ammo. You can also land at your base again to reload your bombs and restore your armor too. You can also use your base to switch aircraft and even change your current module. You use the bombs and bullets to destroy enemy structures and units. On some missions, a friendly aircraft may takeoff occasionally to help you in battle. Tips: • Fly very high or very low to avoid AA guns. • Destroy as much as you can for most points. • Save your points to buy new stronger aircraft. • When you land, you are extremely vulnerable. • Use the top of the screen to make tight turns. • The enemies fire in bursts. Special thanks to Shane McLaffery for testing and development support.

Want to memorize the multiplication tables? This application can help you or your children to easily improve knowledges of the multiplication tables. Do at least one test every day and you'll learn multiplication and division brilliantly soon. You can track statistics of the solved tests with time duration and amount of wrong answers. You can correct wrong answers after testing. Change a maximum multiplier and a divisor from 2 to 11 in settings. You can enable exercises on dividing for the first stage of study and can select which percentage of available equations need to include in a test. Also you can enable prompts while corrections. Features in Premium version: — No ads. — Full statistics vs last three test in free version. — Choice of the multiplication and division signs.
release_text: • Added notification to remind about a test. • Now you can turn on the sounds of answers in Settings. You can hear right and wrong answers. • Added ukrainian language.

description: Каждый день мы выпускаем новости из мира науки, гаджетов и технологий России и зарубежья, написанные простым и понятным языком. Innogest – это бесплатный дайджест инноваций, который поднимет ваш уровень IQ благодаря тестам Сонди, Юнга, эмоциональному тесту на интеллект и тесту на креативность, постоянно пополняющемуся глоссарию научных терминов, шести видам календаря (на выбор: григорианский, еврейский, мусульманский, индийский, китайский и специальный календарь Innogest) и удобному разделу "Инновашки", в котором вы не только узнаете об уникальных инновационных изобретениях, но и сможете заказать их прямо через наше приложение. Дайджест инноваций включает в себя такие разделы: "Технологии" "Цифровой мир" "Медицина" "Робототехника" "Транспорт" "Космос" "Будущее" "Гаджеты" "Сделай сам" "Энергетика" Вместе с Innogest вы всегда будете в курсе последних научных новостей и сможете свободно ориентироваться в увлекательном мире инноваций, читая стильно оформленные статьи в дороге или в любом удобном для вас месте. Every day we release news from the world of science, gadgets and technology in Russia and abroad, written in simple and understandable language. Innogest - a free digest of innovations that will raise your level of IQ tests due to Sondhi, Jung, emotional intelligence test and the test for creativity is constantly updated glossary of scientific terms, the six types of calendar (to choose from: Gregorian, Jewish, Muslim, Indian, Chinese and special calendar Innogest) and is convenient to divide "Innovashki" in which you not only learn about the unique and innovative inventions, but also be able to order them directly through our app. Digest of innovation includes the following sections: "Technology" "Digital World" "Medicine" "Robotics" "Transport" "Cosmos" "The Future" "Gadgets" "Do It Yourself" "Energy" Together with Innogest you will always be aware of the latest research news and will be able to freely navigate the exciting world of innovation, stylish reading articles on the road or in any place convenient for you.

description: Приветствуем тебя, читатель, в нашем мобильном приложении газеты "Активный бизнес"! Это первый пилотный выпуск, который максимально адаптирован под печатную версию газеты «АБ», номер, которой вышел 13 февраля 2014 года. Пользоваться им довольно просто, надо перелистывать страницы движением пальца вправо или влево. Пожалуйста, после того как посмотрите это приложение, напишите отзыв о нем и о материалах в ГуглПлее и в социальных сетях в группах АБ www.vk.com/actibiz и/или www.facebook.com/actibiz с хэштэгом #ГазетаАБ Ваш отзыв поможет нам совершенствовать это приложение и делать больше интересных вам материалов. Спасибо. ---- Информация о газете «Активный бизнес»: "АБ" - это авторитетное деловое издание и единственная бизнес-газета Якутии с 2010 года. Мы не пишем «желтуху», наши журналисты не навязывают собственное мнение и оценку происходящих событий, так как наш читатель обладает высоким интеллектом, широтой взглядов и у него всегда на все собственное мнение и оценка происходящего. Поэтому мы даем только факты, интересные интервью, мнение значимых экспертов и качественную аналитику. Кроме всего выше перечисленного,«АБ» - это также эффективная PR-площадка для продвижения и общения делового сообщества Якутии, где создаются необходимые связи, происходит обмен опытом и экспертными мнениями. РЕГАЛИИ «АБ»: Газета «АБ» признана «Лучшим региональным СМИ России 2011 года» на Всероссийском конкурсе журналистов «Экономическое возрождение России-2011», организованном Союзом журналистов России и ТПП РФ. В ноябре 2012 года на всероссийском дизайнерском конкурсе получила третье призовое место в номинации «Лучший дизайн первой полосы-2011». We welcome you, the reader, in our mobile application newspaper "active business"! This is the first pilot episode, which is the most adapted to the printed version of the newspaper "AB" room, which was released February 13, 2014. Using them is quite simple, it is necessary to turn the pages of a finger right or left. Please look after this application, write a review about it and about the materials in GuglPlee and social networks in groups AB www.vk.com / actibiz and / or www.facebook.com / actibiz with hashtag # GazetaAB Your feedback will help us improve this app and make you more interesting materials. Thank you. ---- Information about the newspaper "Active Business": "AB" - an authoritative business publication and the only business newspaper Yakutia in 2010. We do not write "jaundice" journalists do not impose our own opinions and evaluate the events taking place, as our reader has a high intellect, breadth of vision, and he's always on all own opinion and assessment of what is happening. Therefore, we give only the facts, interesting interviews, experts and opinion meaningful qualitative analysis. Besides all of the above, "AB" - it is also an effective PR-platform for the promotion and communication of the business community in Yakutia, where you create the necessary connections, to share experience and expertise. REGALIA "AB": Newspaper "AB" was recognized as "Best Regional Russian media in 2011" at the All journalists Economic Revival "Russia-2011", organized by the Union of Journalists of Russia and the Russian Chamber of Commerce. In November 2012 at a national design competition won third prize in the nomination "Best Design of the first band-2011."

Феноменальная память – это больше, чем мощный инструмент. Это новый образ жизни. После прохождения нашего курса мнемотехники, ваша способность учиться и запоминать изменится. Изменится ваша жизнь! Мнемотехника - это приемы запоминания информации. Они направлены на развитие памяти и улучшение внимания. Это приложение тренирует память, вы сможете: - изучить основные методы запоминания; - развить визуальное мышление; - улучшить устойчивости внимания; Упражнения представляют собой постепенно увеличивающиеся наборы слов, чисел, слогов, названий. Развивайте и тренируйте память проходя все упражнения. По мотивам книги Марата Зиганова и Владимира Козаренко "Мнемотехника. Запоминание на основе визуального мышления." Phenomenal memory - this is more than a powerful tool. This is a new way of life. After passing our course mnemonics, your ability to learn and memorize change. Will change your life! Mnemonics - this information memorization techniques. They are aimed at the development of memory and improved attention. This app trains memory, you can: - Learn the basic techniques of memorization; - Develop visual thinking; - To improve the stability of attention; Exercises are gradually increasing sets of words, numbers, syllables titles. Develop and train memory through all the exercises. Based on the book Marat Ziganova and Vladimir Kozarenko "Mnemonic. Memorization based on visual thinking."

description: *АРХИТЕКТУРНАЯ ИСТОРИЯ СТОЛИЦЫ* *Знаковые места, маршруты и выдающиеся личности* *Официальное приложение Правительства Москвы* _______________________________________ Не можете продумать маршрут путешествия по интересующим местам столицы? Мобильное приложение «Узнай Москву» поможет вам найти ответы на эти и многие другие вопросы, связанные с архитектурной историей столицы. _______________________________________ Приложение предоставит вам возможность выстроить наиболее интересный маршрут по городу, содержащий максимальное количество интересных исторических мест. Интерактивная карта позволит: - не потеряться во множестве переулков - быстро найти интересующие места (постройки, памятники архитектуры) - максимально сократить путь Интересная информация: - увлекательное описание истории домов с момента строительства по сей день (с фото) - интересные аудио-экскурсии - биографии множества интересных и талантливых исторических личностей - используйте QR-коды для получение ссылки на интересующие объекты _______________________________________ Обратите внимание на другие официальные приложения правительства Москвы. - Наш город – помогите нам сделать город лучше http://goo.gl/qDGDJ - Госуслуги Москвы – государственные услуги и сервисы Москвы http://goo.gl/6HuQ6 - Мобильный туристический портал города Москвы – интересная и полезная информация о городе http://goo.gl/UB2z1 - Парковки Москвы – приложение для поиска и оплаты парковки в Москве http://goo.gl/R3ne6 - Транспорт Москвы – отправка бесплатных сообщений владельца авто и другие полезные сервисы http://goo.gl/Y4Grb - ЖКХ Москвы - подробная информация о службах ЖКХ вашего дома http://goo.gl/Ttprt * ARCHITECTURAL HISTORY OF THE CAPITAL * * Iconic locations, routes, and outstanding personalities * * Official application of the Moscow Government * _______________________________________ You can not think about the travel route on interesting places of the capital? Too many disparate information online? We would like to know more about the historic buildings and personalities of Moscow? Mobile application "Read Moscow" will help you find answers to these and many other questions related to the architectural history of the capital. _______________________________________ The app will give you the opportunity to build the most interesting route around the city, containing the maximum number of interesting historical sites. Interactive map will: - Not to get lost in a variety of lanes - Quickly find the places (buildings, monuments) - Minimize the path Interesting information: - A fascinating account of the history of houses since the construction of the present day (with photos) - Interesting audio tour - Biographies of many interesting and talented historical figures - Use the QR-code to obtain a reference to the objects of interest _______________________________________ Pay attention to the other official application of the Moscow government. - Our Town - help us to make the city better http://goo.gl/qDGDJ - Public services in Moscow - public services and services of Moscow http://goo.gl/6HuQ6 - Mobile travel guide of the city of Moscow - interesting and useful information about the city http://goo.gl/UB2z1 - Parking Moscow - an application for finding and paying for parking in Moscow http://goo.gl/R3ne6 - Transport Moscow - sending free messages car owners and other useful services http://goo.gl/Y4Grb - Utilities Moscow - detailed information about the services of your home utilities http://goo.gl/Ttprt

description: Nonograms, also known as Hanjie or Griddlers, are picture logic puzzles in which cells in a grid must be colored or left blank according to numbers at the side of the grid to reveal a hidden picture. In this puzzle type, the numbers are a form of discrete tomography that measures how many unbroken lines of filled-in squares there are in any given row or column. For example, a clue of "4 8 3" would mean there are sets of four, eight, and three filled squares, in that order, with at least one blank square between successive groups.(Thanks Wiki!) Premium features: No Ads No limits on hints Function Show error
release_text: Added premium mode Added "show errors" function Added errors red marks

description: Библиотека приложения QIWI Кошелёк, для отображения ближайших мест пополнения на карте.

У вас есть свободная минута и пара друзей? Тогда эта игра - то что вам нужно. Один из участников игры - тот, который угадывает, нажимает кнопку "старт" и приставляет устройство (телефон или планшет) ко лбу. По сигналу на экране появляется первое слово из выбранной темы. Другой (или другие - может играть больше чем два человека) участник пытается описать предмет или понятие, название которого он видит на экране. Как только участник с телефоном называет ответ, его оппоненты подтверждают правильность ответа, либо говорят, что ответ неверный. В случае правильного ответа игрок с телефоном наклоняет его вперед для перехода к следующему вопросу, в случае неправильного ответа игрок продолжает отгадывать. Если же понятие так и не было отгадано, для пропуска просто наклоните телефон назад. На одну игру дается 60 секунд. Цель игры - правильно ответить на максимальное количество вопросов по выбранной теме. Ваш рекорд зависит не только от Вашей сообразительности, но и от умения Ваших друзей описать то слово или понятие, которое Вам предстоит угадать. Удачи! Do you have a spare moment and a couple of friends? Then this game - just what you need. One of the participants in the game - one that guesses presses the "start" and puts the device (phone or tablet) to the forehead. At a signal appears on the screen the first word of the chosen theme. Another (or others - can play more than two people) party is trying to describe an object or concept whose name he sees on the screen. Once the participant with the phone calls answer his opponents confirm the correct answer, or say that the answer is incorrect. If the correct answer to the player tilts the phone to move it forward to the next question, in the case of an incorrect answer to guess the player continues. If the concept was never guess to skip just tilt the phone back. At one game, they have 60 seconds. The goal - to correctly answer as many questions on the chosen topic. Your record depends not only on your wits, but also on the ability of your friends to describe the word or concept that you have to guess. Good luck!
release_text: Добавлены новые темы. Добавлена опция "Длительность игры". Повышена стабильность работы.

description: Radio Reconnect is a simply programm that has one function: disable and then enable mobile network connection. Work of other services like Wi-Fi or bluetooth not interrupted. It will be useful when data connection are not connecting. If before you used airplane mode to fix this problem, now it is easy to fix by run Radio Reconnect. Program has no windows and working in background. When all operations are completed (about 10 seconds), program closes automatically. !For Android 2.3 and late programm requires root. Note for Android 2.3 and late: During automatical install in system/app an error may occur. Dont worry about this, just uninstall application and restart your device. Program will appear in menu. Note 2 for Android 2.3 and late (manual install as system): If you have troubles with automatically install application to system app folder, please use this instructions: 1) Install Radio Reconnect from Android Market 2) Find Radio Reconnect apk file in /data/app/ (using Root Explorer and etc) 3) Copy apk file to SD card 4) Remove Radio Reconnect from device 5) Remount system partion for read and write (using Root Explorer, Terminal with command "mount -o remount,rw -t yaffs2 /dev/block/mtdblock3 /system" or using ADB "remount" command) 6) Copy apk file from SD card to /system/app (using Root Explorer and etc) 7) Restart your device
release_text: Now Radio Reconnect is available for all Android versions. For Android 2.3 and late programm requires root.

description: Читайте в свежем номере журнала Naked Science • Тема номера «Игра престолов»: игра с наукой. Мы решили взглянуть на происходящее в фэнтезийном мире с точки зрения науки. • Личность Академик Оганесян: «Не надо путать премию и работу». Сколько неоткрытых элементов в таблице Менделеева? Какие новые элементы уже открыты и чем они особенны? Что такое «острова стабильности»? Почему российская наука плохо финансируется, но талантливые ученые еще остаются? Читайте в интервью первооткрывателя новых химических элементов и наиболее вероятного кандидата на Нобелевскую премию от России Юрия Оганесяна. • Futurity Связанные одной сетью. Будет ли человек жить в виртуальном мире? • History Главные загадки Второй мировой войны. Кто «первый начал», могла ли высадка в Нормандии состояться раньше и почему Сталин не был готов к войне. • Психология НЛП в решете. Что кроется за страшным словосочетанием «нейролингвистическое программирование», можно ли с его помощью соблазнить девушку и как бросить курить? • Технологии Новейшие подлодки России и США. Как будут выглядеть подлодки в будущем? • С точки зрения науки Нормальные герои: Сталин, Гитлер и Ким Ир Сен. Почему люди любят тиранов? • С точки зрения науки Продать себя задорого. Сколько можно заработать, продав свое тело целиком, включая кровь, волосы, внутренние органы и ДНК. И сколько стоят органы по отдельности. • Auto Как устроен болид «Формулы-1»? • А также в номере: – Собака – не волк? – «Новая» теория Ньютона – Дрон для еще более скорой помощи – Кроссовки с «подвеской» Это и многое другое читайте в свежем номере! Read in the latest issue of Naked Science • Special Features "Game of Thrones": a game with science. We decided to take a look at what is happening in a fantasy world from the point of view of science. • Personality Academician Q: "Do not be confused award and work." How many undiscovered elements in the periodic table? What new elements have already been discovered and what they special? What is the "island of stability"? Why Russian science poorly funded, but still talented scientists? Read in an interview with the discoverer of new chemical elements and the most likely candidate for the Nobel Prize of Russia Yuri Hovhannisyan. • Futurity Associated with one network. Will people live in the virtual world? • History The main mysteries of World War II. Who "started it", could the Normandy landings take place earlier and why Stalin was not prepared for war. • Psychology NLP in a sieve. Beyond the terrible phrase "neurolinguistic programming" whether you can use it to seduce the girl and how to quit smoking? • Technology Latest submarine Russia and the United States. Will look like a submarine in the future? • From the point of view of science Normal characters: Stalin, Hitler, and Kim Il Sung. Why do people like tyrants? • From the point of view of science Sell ​​yourself at high prices. How much can you earn by selling its entire body, including blood, hair, internal organs and DNA. And how much are bodies separately. • Auto How does the car, "Formula 1"? • Also in this issue: - Dog - not a wolf? - The "new" theory of Newton - Drone for more ambulances - Running with the "suspension" This and much more, read the latest issue!

This is a pronunciation guide (talking dictionary). Enter a word ー and listen to its pronunciation! The application uses resources of Forvo.com and actually works as its unofficial client. * The app is absolutely free * The app is open-source (Apache 2.0 License) * All pronunciations are provided by native speakers * The app is translated into English, Russian, Turkish, Portuguese, Czech, Spanish, French and Ukrainian * Adaptated for Android 3.0+ tablets The project is here: https://github.com/o2genum/HowToSay An Android programmer? Join the project! Know languages? Any help with translations will be appreciated http://bit.ly/hts-translate Found a bug? https://github.com/o2genum/HowToSay/issues Don't forget to rate How to Say or +1 it!
release_text: * Premium API key to serve more users * UPDATE, OLD VERSIONS WON'T WORK (key change is the reason)

description: Olena Shypilova presents the free course “Italian in 7 Lessons” for RUSSIAN speakers, a program that will help you bring your Italian skills to a level of comfortable communication on basic topics! The program is presented by the site http://speakasap.com . Tailored to beginners, this course is simple, logical, structured and short. The course includes only Basic Italian grammar, the type of grammar used most by people all over the world for everyday communication in Italian. Every lesson is offered in audio format: we provide understandable explanations that make it easy for you to listen to our course anytime on the go. All the exercises address a specific topic with useful and common vocabulary. All answers are provided in audio format. In contrast to typical exercises where you simply click on the correct translation of a word or the correct verb form, leading to boredom and the inability to think on your own, we composed our exercises in a different way. In our exercises you translate the whole sentence at once. You can always check your answers. You will find 80% of all words used in the exercises either in the lesson materials or in previous exercises, so it’s not necessary to consult a dictionary all the time. Moreover, memorizing new words comes with practice, especially when you construct phrases or sentences without assistance. In case you don’t understand something, just consult our language support. You can just write us an e-mail from the application or contact us using the Skype application on your phone. Just call Language Support and have your questions explained. Included in the program: • Full version of the free course “Italian in 7 Lessons” • Interactive exercises for assessing your knowledge and teaching the material • Audio materials with the explanations of the lessons and exercises • Video materials with the explanations of the lessons (requires an internet connection) • Easily access speakASAP online • Quickly get in touch with the Language Support service • All materials (except video materials) are stored on your electronic device and available without an internet connection Join our groups: http://vk.com/speakASAP http://www.facebook.com/speakASAP http://twitter.com/speakASAP http://blog.eustudy.ru Join our YouTube Channel: http://www.youtube.com/user/eustudy We will be happy to receive any comments and propositions from you. Write us at admin@speakasap.com Install! Test it! Let us know about bugs! Study with pleasure! For additional information refer to our site http://speakasap.com/italian_in_7_lessons.html The course’s founder is Olena Shypilova and the speakASAP team.
release_text: Полностью обновлен интерфейс приложения. Добавлена настройка "Не выключать экран". При входящем звонке воспроизведение аудио приостанавливается.
